raw: וְסָמַךְ אֶת־יָדוֹ עַל רֹאשׁ הַחַטָּאת וְשָׁחַט אֶת־הַחַטָּאת בִּמְקוֹם הָעֹלָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin offering, and kill the sin offering in the place of the burnt offering.

raw: וְלָקַח הַכֹּהֵן מִדָּמָהּ בְּאֶצְבָּעוֹ וְנָתַן עַל־קַרְנֹת מִזְבַּח הָעֹלָה וְאֶת־כָּל־דָּמָהּ יִשְׁפֹּךְ אֶל־יְסוֹד הַמִּזְבֵּחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall take of its blood with his finger, and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering; and all its blood he shall pour out at the base of the altar.

raw: וְאֶת־כָּל־חֶלְבָּהּ יָסִיר כַּאֲשֶׁר הוּסַר חֵלֶב מֵעַל זֶבַח הַשְּׁלָמִים וְהִקְטִיר הַכֹּהֵן הַמִּזְבֵּחָה לְרֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ לַיהוָה וְכִפֶּר עָלָיו הַכֹּהֵן וְנִסְלַח לוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all its fat he shall remove, as was removed the fat from upon the sacrifice of peace offerings, and the priest shall offer it up in smoke on the altar as a pleasing aroma to the Lord. And the priest shall make atonement for him, and he shall be forgiven.

raw: וְאִם־כֶּבֶשׂ יָבִיא קָרְבָּנוֹ לְחַטָּאת נְקֵבָה תְמִימָה יְבִיאֶנָּה׃

raw: וְסָמַךְ אֶת־יָדוֹ עַל רֹאשׁ הַחַטָּאת וְשָׁחַט אֹתָהּ לְחַטָּאת בִּמְקוֹם אֲשֶׁר יִשְׁחַט אֶת־הָעֹלָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall lay his hand on the head of the sin offering, and slaughter it for a sin offering in the place where they slaughter the burnt offering.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall take some of the blood of the sin offering with his finger and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering; and all its blood he shall pour out at the base of the altar.

raw: וְאֶת־כָּל־חֶלְבָּה יָסִיר כַּאֲשֶׁר יוּסַר חֵלֶב־הַכֶּשֶׂב מִזֶּבַח הַשְּׁלָמִים וְהִקְטִיר הַכֹּהֵן אֹתָם הַמִּזְבֵּחָה עַל אִשֵּׁי יְהוָה וְכִפֶּר עָלָיו הַכֹּהֵן עַל־חַטָּאתוֹ אֲשֶׁר־חָטָא וְנִסְלַח לוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all its fat he shall remove, just as the fat of the lamb is removed from the sacrifice of peace offerings. raw: וְנֶפֶשׁ כִּי־תֶחֱטָא וְשָׁמְעָה קוֹל אָלָה וְהוּא עֵד אוֹ רָאָה אוֹ יָדָע אִם־לוֹא יַגִּיד וְנָשָׂא עֲוֺנוֹ׃

raw: אוֹ כִי יִגַּע בְּטֻמְאַת אָדָם לְכֹל טֻמְאָתוֹ אֲשֶׁר יִטְמָא בָּהּ וְנֶעְלַם מִמֶּנּוּ וְהוּא יָדַע וְאָשֵׁם׃

raw: אוֹ נֶפֶשׁ כִּי תִשָּׁבַע לְבַטֵּא בִשְׂפָתַיִם לְהָרַע אוֹ לְהֵיטִיב לְכֹל אֲשֶׁר יְבַטֵּא הָאָדָם בִּשְׁבֻעָה וְנֶעְלַם מִמֶּנּוּ וְהוּא־יָדַע וְאָשֵׁם לְאַחַת מֵאֵלֶּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall bring his trespass offering to the Lord, for his sin that he committed, a female from the flock, a lamb or a goat for a sin offering. And the priest shall make atonement for him for his sin.

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if his means suffice not for a lamb, then he shall bring for his trespass offering, which he has committed, two turtledoves, or two young pigeons, unto the LORD; one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering.

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if he cannot afford two turtledoves or two young pigeons, he shall bring as his offering for that which he has sinned, a tenth of an ephah of fine flour for a sin offering. He shall not put oil on it or place frankincense on it, for it is a sin offering.

raw: וֶהֱבִיאָהּ אֶל־הַכֹּהֵן וְקָמַץ הַכֹּהֵן מִמֶּנָּה מְלוֹא קֻמְצוֹ אֶת־אַזְכָּרָתָה וְהִקְטִיר הַמִּזְבֵּחָה עַל אִשֵּׁי יְהוָה חַטָּאת הִוא׃

raw: וְכִפֶּר עָלָיו הַכֹּהֵן עַל־חַטָּאתוֹ אֲשֶׁר־חָטָא מֵאַחַת מֵאֵלֶּה וְנִסְלַח לוֹ וְהָיְתָה לַכֹּהֵן כַּמִּנְחָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: When a person commits a trespass, and sins unwittingly in the holy things of the Lord, then he shall bring for his trespass unto the Lord a ram without blemish from the flocks, according to your valuation in silver shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary, for a trespass offering.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying:

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it shall be, when he shall sin, and be guilty, that he shall restore the stolen thing which he had stolen, or the oppression which he had oppressed, or the deposit which was entrusted to him, or the lost thing which he found.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his guilt offering he shall bring to the Lord, a ram without blemish from the flock, according to your valuation, as a guilt offering to the priest.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall make atonement for him before the LORD, and he shall be forgiven for any one thing of all that he may do, incurring guilt thereby.

raw: וַיַּקְרֵב אֶת־הָאַיִל הַשֵּׁנִי אֵיל הַמִּלֻּאִים וַיִּסְמְכוּ אַהֲרֹן וּבָנָיו אֶת־יְדֵיהֶם עַל־רֹאשׁ הָאָיִל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he brought near the second ram, the ram of consecration, and Aaron and his sons laid their hands on the head of the ram.

raw: וַיִּשְׁחָט וַיִּקַּח מֹשֶׁה מִדָּמוֹ וַיִּתֵּן עַל־תְּנוּךְ אֹזֶן־אַהֲרֹן הַיְמָנִית וְעַל־בֹּהֶן יָדוֹ הַיְמָנִית וְעַל־בֹּהֶן רַגְלוֹ הַיְמָנִית׃

raw: וַיַּקְרֵב אֶת־בְּנֵי אַהֲרֹן וַיִּתֵּן מֹשֶׁה מִן־הַדָּם עַל־תְּנוּךְ אָזְנָם הַיְמָנִית וְעַל־בֹּהֶן יָדָם הַיְמָנִית וְעַל־בֹּהֶן רַגְלָם הַיְמָנִית וַיִּזְרֹק מֹשֶׁה אֶת־הַדָּם עַל־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ סָבִיב׃

raw: וַיִּתֵּן אֶת־הַכֹּל עַל כַּפֵּי אַהֲרֹן וְעַל כַּפֵּי בָנָיו וַיָּנֶף אֹתָם תְּנוּפָה לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר מֹשֶׁה אֶל־אַהֲרֹן וְאֶל־בָּנָיו בַּשְּׁלוּ אֶת־הַבָּשָׂר פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וְשָׁם תֹּאכְלוּ אֹתוֹ וְאֶת־הַלֶּחֶם אֲשֶׁר בְּסַל הַמִּלֻּאִים כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוֵּיתִי לֵאמֹר אַהֲרֹן וּבָנָיו יֹאכְלֻהוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses said to Aaron and to his sons: "Boil the flesh at the entrance of the tent of meeting, and there you shall eat it and the bread that is in the basket of ordination, as I commanded, saying, 'Aaron and his sons shall eat it.'"

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the little owl, and the cormorant, and the great owl.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the stork, the heron after its kind, the hoopoe, and the bat.

raw: כֹּל שֶׁרֶץ הָעוֹף הַהֹלֵךְ עַל־אַרְבַּע שֶׁקֶץ הוּא לָכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Every winged swarming thing that walks on four [legs] is an abomination to you.

raw: אַךְ אֶת־זֶה תֹּאכְלוּ מִכֹּל שֶׁרֶץ הָעוֹף הַהֹלֵךְ עַל־אַרְבַּע אֲשֶׁר־לא [לוֹ] כְרָעַיִם מִמַּעַל לְרַגְלָיו לְנַתֵּר בָּהֵן עַל־הָאָרֶץ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: However, these you may eat of all winged creeping things that walk on fours, which have legs above their feet with which to leap on the earth.

raw: אֶת־אֵלֶּה מֵהֶם תֹּאכֵלוּ אֶת־הָאַרְבֶּה לְמִינוֹ וְאֶת־הַסָּלְעָם לְמִינֵהוּ וְאֶת־הַחַרְגֹּל לְמִינֵהוּ וְאֶת־הֶחָגָב לְמִינֵהוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: These of them you may eat: the locust after its kind, the bald locust after its kind, the cricket after its kind, and the grasshopper after its kind.

raw: וְכֹל שֶׁרֶץ הָעוֹף אֲשֶׁר־לוֹ אַרְבַּע רַגְלָיִם שֶׁקֶץ הוּא לָכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all winged swarming things that have four legs are an abomination to you.

raw: וּלְאֵלֶּה תִּטַּמָּאוּ כָּל־הַנֹּגֵעַ בְּנִבְלָתָם יִטְמָא עַד־הָעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And by these you shall become unclean; whoever touches their carcass shall be unclean until evening.

raw: וְכָל־הַנֹּשֵׂא מִנִּבְלָתָם יְכַבֵּס בְּגָדָיו וְטָמֵא עַד־הָעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And whoever carries any of their carcass shall wash his clothes and be unclean until evening.

raw: לְכָל־הַבְּהֵמָה אֲשֶׁר הִוא מַפְרֶסֶת פַּרְסָה וְשֶׁסַע אֵינֶנָּה שֹׁסַעַת וְגֵרָה אֵינֶנָּה מַעֲלָה טְמֵאִים הֵם לָכֶם כָּל־הַנֹּגֵעַ בָּהֶם יִטְמָא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Every beast that parts the hoof, but does not have a completely split hoof or does not ruminate, is unclean to you. Whoever touches them shall be unclean.

raw: וְכֹל הוֹלֵךְ עַל־כַּפָּיו בְּכָל־הַחַיָּה הַהֹלֶכֶת עַל־אַרְבַּע טְמֵאִים הֵם לָכֶם כָּל־הַנֹּגֵעַ בְּנִבְלָתָם יִטְמָא עַד־הָעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all that goeth upon his paws, among all manner of beasts that go upon all four, they are unclean unto you: whoso toucheth their carcase shall be unclean until even.

raw: וְהַנֹּשֵׂא אֶת־נִבְלָתָם יְכַבֵּס בְּגָדָיו וְטָמֵא עַד־הָעָרֶב טְמֵאִים הֵמָּה לָכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he that beareth the carcass of them shall wash his clothes, and be unclean until the even: they are unclean unto you.

raw: וְזֶה לָכֶם הַטָּמֵא בַּשֶּׁרֶץ הַשֹּׁרֵץ עַל־הָאָרֶץ הַחֹלֶד וְהָעַכְבָּר וְהַצָּב לְמִינֵהוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And this is unclean for you among the swarming things that swarm on the earth: the mole, and the mouse, and the lizard according to its kind.

raw: וְהָאֲנָקָה וְהַכֹּחַ וְהַלְּטָאָה וְהַחֹמֶט וְהַתִּנְשָׁמֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the gecko, and the land-crocodile, and the lizard, and the sand-lizard, and the chameleon.

raw: אֵלֶּה הַטְּמֵאִים לָכֶם בְּכָל־הַשָּׁרֶץ כָּל־הַנֹּגֵעַ בָּהֶם בְּמֹתָם יִטְמָא עַד־הָעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: These are unclean to you among all the swarming things. Whoever touches them when they are dead shall be unclean until evening.

raw: וְכֹל אֲשֶׁר־יִפֹּל־עָלָיו מֵהֶם בְּמֹתָם יִטְמָא מִכָּל־כְּלִי־עֵץ אוֹ בֶגֶד אוֹ־עוֹר אוֹ שָׂק כָּל־כְּלִי אֲשֶׁר־יֵעָשֶׂה מְלָאכָה בָּהֶם בַּמַּיִם יוּבָא וְטָמֵא עַד־הָעֶרֶב וְטָהֵר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And anything of them that falls on something when they die shall be unclean; whether it is any wooden utensil, clothing, skin, or sack, any utensil used for any work shall be put in water, and it shall be unclean until evening, and then it shall be clean.

raw: וְכָל־כְּלִי־חֶרֶשׂ אֲשֶׁר־יִפֹּל מֵהֶם אֶל־תּוֹכוֹ כֹּל אֲשֶׁר בְּתוֹכוֹ יִטְמָא וְאֹתוֹ תִשְׁבֹּרוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And every earthen vessel, into which any of them falls, everything inside it shall be unclean, and you shall break it.

raw: מִכָּל־הָאֹכֶל אֲשֶׁר יֵאָכֵל אֲשֶׁר יָבוֹא עָלָיו מַיִם יִטְמָא וְכָל־מַשְׁקֶה אֲשֶׁר יִשָּׁתֶה בְּכָל־כְּלִי יִטְמָא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all the food which is eaten, upon which water comes, shall be unclean; and all drink which is drunk in any vessel shall be unclean.

raw: וְכֹל אֲשֶׁר־יִפֹּל מִנִּבְלָתָם עָלָיו יִטְמָא תַּנּוּר וְכִירַיִם יֻתָּץ טְמֵאִים הֵם וּטְמֵאִים יִהְיוּ לָכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And everything which falls from their carcass upon it shall be unclean; an oven or cooking stove shall be broken down; they are unclean, and shall be unclean to you.

raw: אַךְ מַעְיָן וּבוֹר מִקְוֵה־מַיִם יִהְיֶה טָהוֹר וְנֹגֵעַ בְּנִבְלָתָם יִטְמָא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Nevertheless, a spring or a cistern holding a collection of water, that shall be clean, but whoever touches their carcass shall be unclean.

raw: וְכִי יִפֹּל מִנִּבְלָתָם עַל־כָּל־זֶרַע זֵרוּעַ אֲשֶׁר יִזָּרֵעַ טָהוֹר הוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if any of their carcass falls on any seed for sowing that is to be sown, it is clean.

raw: וְכִי יֻתַּן־מַיִם עַל־זֶרַע וְנָפַל מִנִּבְלָתָם עָלָיו טָמֵא הוּא לָכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if water is put on seed and part of their carcass falls on it, it is unclean to you.

raw: וְכִי יָמוּת מִן־הַבְּהֵמָה אֲשֶׁר־הִיא לָכֶם לְאָכְלָה הַנֹּגֵעַ בְּנִבְלָתָהּ יִטְמָא עַד־הָעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if any animal of the herd, which is yours to eat, dies, he who touches its carcass shall be unclean until evening.

raw: וְהָאֹכֵל מִנִּבְלָתָהּ יְכַבֵּס בְּגָדָיו וְטָמֵא עַד־הָעָרֶב וְהַנֹּשֵׂא אֶת־נִבְלָתָהּ יְכַבֵּס בְּגָדָיו וְטָמֵא עַד־הָעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he who eats of its carcass shall wash his clothes and be unclean until evening. And he who carries its carcass shall wash his clothes and be unclean until evening.

raw: וְכָל־הַשֶּׁרֶץ הַשֹּׁרֵץ עַל־הָאָרֶץ שֶׁקֶץ הוּא לֹא יֵאָכֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And every swarming thing that swarms on the earth is detestable; it shall not be eaten.

raw: כֹּל הוֹלֵךְ עַל־גָּחוֹן וְכֹל הוֹלֵךְ עַל־אַרְבַּע עַד כָּל־מַרְבֵּה רַגְלַיִם לְכָל־הַשֶּׁרֶץ הַשֹּׁרֵץ עַל־הָאָרֶץ לֹא תֹאכְלוּם כִּי־שֶׁקֶץ הֵם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Everything that creeps on its belly, and everything that goes on four [legs], even all that have many feet, all that swarm upon the earth, you shall not eat, for they are detestable.

raw: אַל־תְּשַׁקְּצוּ אֶת־נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶם בְּכָל־הַשֶּׁרֶץ הַשֹּׁרֵץ וְלֹא תִטַּמְּאוּ בָּהֶם וְנִטְמֵתֶם בָּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Do not detest your souls with any swarming thing that swarms, and do not defile yourselves with them, lest you become defiled by them.

raw: כִּי אֲנִי יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵיכֶם וְהִתְקַדִּשְׁתֶּם וִהְיִיתֶם קְדֹשִׁים כִּי קָדוֹשׁ אָנִי וְלֹא תְטַמְּאוּ אֶת־נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶם בְּכָל־הַשֶּׁרֶץ הָרֹמֵשׂ עַל־הָאָרֶץ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For I am the Lord your God. Consecrate yourselves therefore, and be holy, for I am holy. You shall not defile yourselves with any swarming thing that crawls on the ground.

raw: כִּי אֲנִי יְהוָה הַמַּעֲלֶה אֶתְכֶם מֵאֶרֶץ מִצְרַיִם לִהְיֹת לָכֶם לֵאלֹהִים וִהְיִיתֶם קְדֹשִׁים כִּי קָדוֹשׁ אָנִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For I am the Lord who brought you up out of the land of Egypt to be your God; you shall be holy, for I am holy.

raw: זֹאת תּוֹרַת הַבְּהֵמָה וְהָעוֹף וְכֹל נֶפֶשׁ הַחַיָּה הָרֹמֶשֶׂת בַּמָּיִם וּלְכָל־נֶפֶשׁ הַשֹּׁרֶצֶת עַל־הָאָרֶץ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: This is the law of the beast and the bird and every living creature that moves in the waters and of every creature that swarms upon the earth.

raw: לְהַבְדִּיל בֵּין הַטָּמֵא וּבֵין הַטָּהֹר וּבֵין הַחַיָּה הַנֶּאֱכֶלֶת וּבֵין הַחַיָּה אֲשֶׁר לֹא תֵאָכֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: To distinguish between the unclean and the clean, and between the animal that may be eaten and the animal that may not be eaten.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: דַּבֵּר אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לֵאמֹר אִשָּׁה כִּי תַזְרִיעַ וְיָלְדָה זָכָר וְטָמְאָה שִׁבְעַת יָמִים כִּימֵי נִדַּת דְּוֺתָהּ תִּטְמָא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Speak to the children of Israel, saying: ‘If a woman conceives and bears a male child, then she shall be unclean seven days; as in the days of her customary impurity she shall be unclean.

raw: וּבַיּוֹם הַשְּׁמִינִי יִמּוֹל בְּשַׂר עָרְלָתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And on the eighth day, he shall circumcise the flesh of his foreskin.

raw: וּשְׁלֹשִׁים יוֹם וּשְׁלֹשֶׁת יָמִים תֵּשֵׁב בִּדְמֵי טָהֳרָה בְּכָל־קֹדֶשׁ לֹא־תִגָּע וְאֶל־הַמִּקְדָּשׁ לֹא תָבֹא עַד־מְלֹאת יְמֵי טָהֳרָהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And thirty days and three days she shall remain in the blood of purification; she shall not touch any holy thing, nor come into the sanctuary, until the days of her purification are fulfilled.

raw: וְאִם־נְקֵבָה תֵלֵד וְטָמְאָה שְׁבֻעַיִם כְּנִדָּתָהּ וְשִׁשִּׁים יוֹם וְשֵׁשֶׁת יָמִים תֵּשֵׁב עַל־דְּמֵי טָהֳרָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if she bears a female child, then she shall be impure for two weeks, as in her menstruation; and she shall remain for sixty-six days on account of blood of purification.

raw: וּבִמְלֹאת יְמֵי טָהֳרָהּ לְבֵן אוֹ לְבַת תָּבִיא כֶּבֶשׂ בֶּן־שְׁנָתוֹ לְעֹלָה וּבֶן־יוֹנָה אוֹ־תֹר לְחַטָּאת אֶל־פֶּתַח אֹהֶל־מוֹעֵד אֶל־הַכֹּהֵן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And when the days of her purification are completed, whether for a son or a daughter, she shall bring a lamb a year old for a burnt offering, and a young pigeon or a turtledove for a sin offering, to the entrance of the tent of meeting, to the priest.

raw: וְהִקְרִיבוֹ לִפְנֵי יְהוָה וְכִפֶּר עָלֶיהָ וְטָהֲרָה מִמְּקֹר דָּמֶיהָ זֹאת תּוֹרַת הַיֹּלֶדֶת לַזָּכָר אוֹ לַנְּקֵבָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall offer it before the LORD, and he shall make atonement for her, and she shall be cleansed from the source of her blood. This is the law for her who bears, whether for a male or for a female.

raw: וְאִם־לֹא תִמְצָא יָדָהּ דֵּי שֶׂה וְלָקְחָה שְׁתֵּי־תֹרִים אוֹ שְׁנֵי בְּנֵי יוֹנָה אֶחָד לְעֹלָה וְאֶחָד לְחַטָּאת וְכִפֶּר עָלֶיהָ הַכֹּהֵן וְטָהֵרָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But, if she cannot afford a lamb, she shall take two turtledoves, or two young pigeons; the one for a burnt offering, and the other for a sin offering: and the priest shall make an atonement for her, and she shall be clean.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְאֶל־אַהֲרֹן לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying:

raw: אָדָם כִּי־יִהְיֶה בְעוֹר־בְּשָׂרוֹ שְׂאֵת אוֹ־סַפַּחַת אוֹ בַהֶרֶת וְהָיָה בְעוֹר־בְּשָׂרוֹ לְנֶגַע צָרָעַת וְהוּבָא אֶל־אַהֲרֹן הַכֹּהֵן אוֹ אֶל־אַחַד מִבָּנָיו הַכֹּהֲנִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: When a man shall have in the skin of his flesh a rising, a scab, or a bright spot, and it becomes in the skin of his flesh the plague of leprosy, then he shall be brought unto Aaron the priest, or unto one of his sons the priests.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if there be in the bald head, or bald forehead, a white reddish plague, it is a spreading leprosy in his bald head, or in his bald forehead.

raw: וְרָאָה אֹתוֹ הַכֹּהֵן וְהִנֵּה שְׂאֵת־הַנֶּגַע לְבָנָה אֲדַמְדֶּמֶת בְּקָרַחְתּוֹ אוֹ בְגַבַּחְתּוֹ כְּמַרְאֵה צָרַעַת עוֹר בָּשָׂר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall examine him, and if there is a white reddish swelling in his bald spot or forehead, resembling a skin disease on the body,

raw: אִישׁ־צָרוּעַ הוּא טָמֵא הוּא טַמֵּא יְטַמְּאֶנּוּ הַכֹּהֵן בְּרֹאשׁוֹ נִגְעוֹ׃

raw: וְהַצָּרוּעַ אֲשֶׁר־בּוֹ הַנֶּגַע בְּגָדָיו יִהְיוּ פְרֻמִים וְרֹאשׁוֹ יִהְיֶה פָרוּעַ וְעַל־שָׂפָם יַעְטֶה וְטָמֵא טָמֵא יִקְרָא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the leper who has the disease shall wear torn clothes and let the hair of his head be disheveled, and he shall cover his upper lip and cry out, 'Unclean, unclean.'

ai_data.translation_rugged: All the days that the plague is in him he shall be defiled. He is unclean. He shall dwell alone; outside the camp shall be his dwelling.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the garment, when there will be in it a plague of leprosy, in a garment of wool or in a garment of linen.

ai_data.translation_rugged: Whether in warp or in woof, or in anything made of linen or wool, or in a hide, or in anything made of hide,

raw: וְהָיָה הַנֶּגַע יְרַקְרַק אוֹ אֲדַמְדָּם בַּבֶּגֶד אוֹ בָעוֹר אוֹ־בַשְּׁתִי אוֹ־בָעֵרֶב אוֹ בְכָל־כְּלִי־עוֹר נֶגַע צָרַעַת הוּא וְהָרְאָה אֶת־הַכֹּהֵן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall see the affliction and quarantine the affliction for seven days.

raw: וְרָאָה אֶת־הַנֶּגַע בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי כִּי־פָשָׂה הַנֶּגַע בַּבֶּגֶד אוֹ־בַשְּׁתִי אוֹ־בָעֵרֶב אוֹ בָעוֹר לְכֹל אֲשֶׁר־יֵעָשֶׂה הָעוֹר לִמְלָאכָה צָרַעַת מַמְאֶרֶת הַנֶּגַע טָמֵא הוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall see the plague on the seventh day: if the plague has spread in the garment, or in the warp, or in the woof, or in the skin, for any purpose for which the skin is used, it is a spreading leprosy; it is unclean.

raw: וְשָׂרַף אֶת־הַבֶּגֶד אוֹ אֶת־הַשְּׁתִי אוֹ אֶת־הָעֵרֶב בַּצֶּמֶר אוֹ בַפִּשְׁתִּים אוֹ אֶת־כָּל־כְּלִי הָעוֹר אֲשֶׁר־יִהְיֶה בוֹ הַנָּגַע כִּי־צָרַעַת מַמְאֶרֶת הִוא בָּאֵשׁ תִּשָּׂרֵף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if the priest sees, and behold, the disease has not spread in the garment or in the warp or in the woof or in any article of skin,

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall command, and they shall wash that which has the plague in it, and he shall quarantine it for seven days the second time.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall see after the plague has been washed, and behold, the plague has not changed its appearance, and the plague has not spread; it is unclean, with fire you shall burn it; it is a fretted spot, whether in its bald head or in its forehead.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it shall be on the seventh day that he shall shave all his hair—his head, his beard, and his eyebrows—and he shall shave all his hair. He shall wash his clothes, and he shall bathe his body in water, and he shall be clean.

raw: וּמִיֶּתֶר הַשֶּׁמֶן אֲשֶׁר עַל־כַּפּוֹ יִתֵּן הַכֹּהֵן עַל־תְּנוּךְ אֹזֶן הַמִּטַּהֵר הַיְמָנִית וְעַל־בֹּהֶן יָדוֹ הַיְמָנִית וְעַל־בֹּהֶן רַגְלוֹ הַיְמָנִית עַל דַּם הָאָשָׁם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And from the rest of the oil that is on his palm, the priest shall put on the lobe of the right ear of the one being purified, and on the thumb of his right hand, and on the big toe of his right foot, on the blood of the guilt offering.

raw: וְהַנּוֹתָר בַּשֶּׁמֶן אֲשֶׁר עַל־כַּף הַכֹּהֵן יִתֵּן עַל־רֹאשׁ הַמִּטַּהֵר וְכִפֶּר עָלָיו הַכֹּהֵן לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the remainder of the oil that [is] upon the palm of the priest, he shall put on the head of the one to be cleansed, and the priest shall make atonement for him before the LORD.

raw: וְעָשָׂה הַכֹּהֵן אֶת־הַחַטָּאת וְכִפֶּר עַל־הַמִּטַּהֵר מִטֻּמְאָתוֹ וְאַחַר יִשְׁחַט אֶת־הָעֹלָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall offer the sin offering, and make atonement for the one to be cleansed from his uncleanness; and afterward he shall slaughter the burnt offering.

raw: וְהֶעֱלָה הַכֹּהֵן אֶת־הָעֹלָה וְאֶת־הַמִּנְחָה הַמִּזְבֵּחָה וְכִפֶּר עָלָיו הַכֹּהֵן וְטָהֵר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall offer the burnt offering and the meal offering on the altar, and the priest shall make atonement for him, and he shall be clean.

raw: וְאִם־דַּל הוּא וְאֵין יָדוֹ מַשֶּׂגֶת וְלָקַח כֶּבֶשׂ אֶחָד אָשָׁם לִתְנוּפָה לְכַפֵּר עָלָיו וְעִשָּׂרוֹן סֹלֶת אֶחָד בָּלוּל בַּשֶּׁמֶן לְמִנְחָה וְלֹג שָׁמֶן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if he is poor and cannot afford it, then he shall take one male lamb for a guilt offering, to be a wave offering to make atonement for him, and one tenth of an ephah of fine flour mixed with oil for a grain offering, and a log of oil.

raw: וּשְׁתֵּי תֹרִים אוֹ שְׁנֵי בְּנֵי יוֹנָה אֲשֶׁר תַּשִּׂיג יָדוֹ וְהָיָה אֶחָד חַטָּאת וְהָאֶחָד עֹלָה׃

raw: וְהֵבִיא אֹתָם בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁמִינִי לְטָהֳרָתוֹ אֶל־הַכֹּהֵן אֶל־פֶּתַח אֹהֶל־מוֹעֵד לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall bring them on the eighth day for his purification to the priest, to the entrance of the tent of meeting, before the Lord.

raw: וְלָקַח הַכֹּהֵן אֶת־כֶּבֶשׂ הָאָשָׁם וְאֶת־לֹג הַשָּׁמֶן וְהֵנִיף אֹתָם הַכֹּהֵן תְּנוּפָה לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

raw: וְשָׁחַט אֶת־כֶּבֶשׂ הָאָשָׁם וְלָקַח הַכֹּהֵן מִדַּם הָאָשָׁם וְנָתַן עַל־תְּנוּךְ אֹזֶן־הַמִּטַּהֵר הַיְמָנִית וְעַל־בֹּהֶן יָדוֹ הַיְמָנִית וְעַל־בֹּהֶן רַגְלוֹ הַיְמָנִית׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall slaughter the lamb of the guilt offering, and the priest shall take some of the blood of the guilt offering and put it on the lobe of the right ear of the one to be cleansed, and on the thumb of his right hand and on the big toe of his right foot.

raw: וּמִן־הַשֶּׁמֶן יִצֹק הַכֹּהֵן עַל־כַּף הַכֹּהֵן הַשְּׂמָאלִית׃

raw: וְהִזָּה הַכֹּהֵן בְּאֶצְבָּעוֹ הַיְמָנִית מִן־הַשֶּׁמֶן אֲשֶׁר עַל־כַּפּוֹ הַשְּׂמָאלִית שֶׁבַע פְּעָמִים לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall sprinkle with his right finger some of the oil that is in his left palm seven times before the Lord.

raw: וְנָתַן הַכֹּהֵן מִן־הַשֶּׁמֶן אֲשֶׁר עַל־כַּפּוֹ עַל־תְּנוּךְ אֹזֶן הַמִּטַּהֵר הַיְמָנִית וְעַל־בֹּהֶן יָדוֹ הַיְמָנִית וְעַל־בֹּהֶן רַגְלוֹ הַיְמָנִית עַל־מְקוֹם דַּם הָאָשָׁם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall put some of the oil that is in his palm on the lobe of the right ear of the one being purified, and on the thumb of his right hand and on the big toe of his right foot, on the place of the blood of the guilt offering.

raw: וְהַנּוֹתָר מִן־הַשֶּׁמֶן אֲשֶׁר עַל־כַּף הַכֹּהֵן יִתֵּן עַל־רֹאשׁ הַמִּטַּהֵר לְכַפֵּר עָלָיו לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

raw: וְעָשָׂה אֶת־הָאֶחָד מִן־הַתֹּרִים אוֹ מִן־בְּנֵי הַיּוֹנָה מֵאֲשֶׁר תַּשִּׂיג יָדוֹ׃

raw: אֵת אֲשֶׁר־תַּשִּׂיג יָדוֹ אֶת־הָאֶחָד חַטָּאת וְאֶת־הָאֶחָד עֹלָה עַל־הַמִּנְחָה וְכִפֶּר הַכֹּהֵן עַל הַמִּטַּהֵר לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

raw: זֹאת תּוֹרַת אֲשֶׁר־בּוֹ נֶגַע צָרָעַת אֲשֶׁר לֹא־תַשִּׂיג יָדוֹ בְּטָהֳרָתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: This [is] the law of him in whom [is] the plague of leprosy, whose hand cannot reach [to what is required] for his cleansing.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְאֶל־אַהֲרֹן לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses and Aaron, saying:

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall look at the plague, and behold, the plague is in the walls of the house, cavities greenish or reddish, and their appearance is lower than the wall.

raw: וְיָצָא הַכֹּהֵן מִן־הַבַּיִת אֶל־פֶּתַח הַבָּיִת וְהִסְגִּיר אֶת־הַבַּיִת שִׁבְעַת יָמִים׃

raw: וְשָׁב הַכֹּהֵן בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי וְרָאָה וְהִנֵּה פָּשָׂה הַנֶּגַע בְּקִירֹת הַבָּיִת׃

raw: וְאִם־בֹּא יָבֹא הַכֹּהֵן וְרָאָה וְהִנֵּה לֹא־פָשָׂה הַנֶּגַע בַּבַּיִת אַחֲרֵי הִטֹּחַ אֶת־הַבָּיִת וְטִהַר הַכֹּהֵן אֶת־הַבַּיִת כִּי נִרְפָּא הַנָּגַע׃

raw: וְהִקְרִיב אַהֲרֹן אֶת־פַּר הַחַטָּאת אֲשֶׁר־לוֹ וְכִפֶּר בַּעֲדוֹ וּבְעַד בֵּיתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Aaron shall offer the bull of the sin offering, which is for himself, and make atonement for himself and for his house.

raw: וְלָקַח אֶת־שְׁנֵי הַשְּׂעִירִם וְהֶעֱמִיד אֹתָם לִפְנֵי יְהוָה פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall take the two male goats and present them before the Lord at the entrance of the tent of meeting.

raw: וְנָתַן אַהֲרֹן עַל־שְׁנֵי הַשְּׂעִירִם גּוֹרָלוֹת גּוֹרָל אֶחָד לַיהוָה וְגוֹרָל אֶחָד לַעֲזָאזֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Aaron shall cast lots upon the two goats, one lot for the LORD and the other lot for Azazel.

raw: וְהִקְרִיב אַהֲרֹן אֶת־הַשָּׂעִיר אֲשֶׁר עָלָה עָלָיו הַגּוֹרָל לַיהוָה וְעָשָׂהוּ חַטָּאת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Aaron shall present the goat on which the lot fell for the Lord, and offer it as a sin offering.

raw: וְהַשָּׂעִיר אֲשֶׁר עָלָה עָלָיו הַגּוֹרָל לַעֲזָאזֵל יָעֳמַד־חַי לִפְנֵי יְהוָה לְכַפֵּר עָלָיו לְשַׁלַּח אֹתוֹ לַעֲזָאזֵל הַמִּדְבָּרָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the goat, upon which the lot fell for Azazel, shall be presented alive before the LORD to make atonement upon it, to send it to Azazel into the wilderness.

raw: וְהִקְרִיב אַהֲרֹן אֶת־פַּר הַחַטָּאת אֲשֶׁר־לוֹ וְכִפֶּר בַּעֲדוֹ וּבְעַד בֵּיתוֹ וְשָׁחַט אֶת־פַּר הַחַטָּאת אֲשֶׁר־לוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Aaron shall offer the bull as a sin offering, which is for himself, and make atonement for himself and for his house, and shall slaughter the bull as a sin offering, which is for himself.

raw: וְלָקַח מְלֹא־הַמַּחְתָּה גַּחֲלֵי־אֵשׁ מֵעַל הַמִּזְבֵּחַ מִלִּפְנֵי יְהוָה וּמְלֹא חָפְנָיו קְטֹרֶת סַמִּים דַּקָּה וְהֵבִיא מִבֵּית לַפָּרֹכֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall take a censer full of burning coals of fire from off the altar before the LORD, and his hands full of sweet incense beaten small, and bring it within the veil.

raw: וְנָתַן אֶת־הַקְּטֹרֶת עַל־הָאֵשׁ לִפְנֵי יְהוָה וְכִסָּה עֲנַן הַקְּטֹרֶת אֶת־הַכַּפֹּרֶת אֲשֶׁר עַל־הָעֵדוּת וְלֹא יָמוּת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall put the incense on the fire before the LORD, that the cloud of the incense may cover the mercy seat that is on the testimony, so that he does not die.

raw: וְלָקַח מִדַּם הַפָּר וְהִזָּה בְאֶצְבָּעוֹ עַל־פְּנֵי הַכַּפֹּרֶת קֵדְמָה וְלִפְנֵי הַכַּפֹּרֶת יַזֶּה שֶׁבַע־פְּעָמִים מִן־הַדָּם בְּאֶצְבָּעוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall take of the blood of the bull, and sprinkle it with his finger on the mercy seat eastward; and before the mercy seat he shall sprinkle of the blood seven times with his finger.

raw: וְשָׁחַט אֶת־שְׂעִיר הַחַטָּאת אֲשֶׁר לָעָם וְהֵבִיא אֶת־דָּמוֹ אֶל־מִבֵּית לַפָּרֹכֶת וְעָשָׂה אֶת־דָּמוֹ כַּאֲשֶׁר עָשָׂה לְדַם הַפָּר וְהִזָּה אֹתוֹ עַל־הַכַּפֹּרֶת וְלִפְנֵי הַכַּפֹּרֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall slaughter the goat of the sin offering which is for the people, and bring its blood inside the veil, and do with its blood as he did with the blood of the bull, and sprinkle it on the mercy seat and before the mercy seat.

raw: וְכִפֶּר עַל־הַקֹּדֶשׁ מִטֻּמְאֹת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וּמִפִּשְׁעֵיהֶם לְכָל־חַטֹּאתָם וְכֵן יַעֲשֶׂה לְאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד הַשֹּׁכֵן אִתָּם בְּתוֹךְ טֻמְאֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall make atonement for the sanctuary, because of the uncleannesses of the children of Israel, and because of their transgressions, even for all their sins; and so shall he do for the tent of meeting, that dwells with them in the midst of their uncleannesses.

raw: וְכָל־אָדָם לֹא־יִהְיֶה בְּאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד בְּבֹאוֹ לְכַפֵּר בַּקֹּדֶשׁ עַד־צֵאתוֹ וְכִפֶּר בַּעֲדוֹ וּבְעַד בֵּיתוֹ וּבְעַד כָּל־קְהַל יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And no man shall be in the tent of meeting when he enters to make atonement in the Holy Place until he comes out and has made atonement for himself and for his house and for all the assembly of Israel.

raw: וְיָצָא אֶל־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ אֲשֶׁר לִפְנֵי־יְהוָה וְכִפֶּר עָלָיו וְלָקַח מִדַּם הַפָּר וּמִדַּם הַשָּׂעִיר וְנָתַן עַל־קַרְנוֹת הַמִּזְבֵּחַ סָבִיב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall go out to the altar that is before the LORD, and make atonement for it, and shall take some of the blood of the bull and of the blood of the goat, and put it on the horns of the altar all around.

raw: וְהִזָּה עָלָיו מִן־הַדָּם בְּאֶצְבָּעוֹ שֶׁבַע פְּעָמִים וְטִהֲרוֹ וְקִדְּשׁוֹ מִטֻּמְאֹת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall sprinkle on him some of the blood with his finger seven times, and cleanse him and consecrate him from the uncleannesses of the children of Israel.

raw: וְכִלָּה מִכַּפֵּר אֶת־הַקֹּדֶשׁ וְאֶת־אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וְאֶת־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ וְהִקְרִיב אֶת־הַשָּׂעִיר הֶחָי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall have finished atoning for the sanctuary, the tent of meeting, and the altar, and he shall present the live goat.

raw: וְסָמַךְ אַהֲרֹן אֶת־שְׁתֵּי ידו [יָדָיו] עַל רֹאשׁ הַשָּׂעִיר הַחַי וְהִתְוַדָּה עָלָיו אֶת־כָּל־עֲוֺנֹת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְאֶת־כָּל־פִּשְׁעֵיהֶם לְכָל־חַטֹּאתָם וְנָתַן אֹתָם עַל־רֹאשׁ הַשָּׂעִיר וְשִׁלַּח בְּיַד־אִישׁ עִתִּי הַמִּדְבָּרָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Aaron shall lay both his hands upon the head of the live goat, and confess over it all the iniquities of the children of Israel, and all their transgressions, even all their sins; and he shall put them upon the head of the goat, and send it away by the hand of a fit man into the wilderness.

raw: וְנָשָׂא הַשָּׂעִיר עָלָיו אֶת־כָּל־עֲוֺנֹתָם אֶל־אֶרֶץ גְּזֵרָה וְשִׁלַּח אֶת־הַשָּׂעִיר בַּמִּדְבָּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the goat shall bear upon itself all their iniquities to a solitary land, and he shall release the goat in the wilderness.

raw: וּבָא אַהֲרֹן אֶל־אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וּפָשַׁט אֶת־בִּגְדֵי הַבָּד אֲשֶׁר לָבַשׁ בְּבֹאוֹ אֶל־הַקֹּדֶשׁ וְהִנִּיחָם שָׁם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Aaron shall come into the Tent of Meeting, and shall take off the linen garments, which he put on when he went into the holy place, and shall leave them there.

raw: וְרָחַץ אֶת־בְּשָׂרוֹ בַמַּיִם בְּמָקוֹם קָדוֹשׁ וְלָבַשׁ אֶת־בְּגָדָיו וְיָצָא וְעָשָׂה אֶת־עֹלָתוֹ וְאֶת־עֹלַת הָעָם וְכִפֶּר בַּעֲדוֹ וּבְעַד הָעָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall bathe his body in water in a holy place and put on his garments and come out and offer his burnt offering and the burnt offering of the people and make atonement for himself and for the people.

raw: וְאֵת חֵלֶב הַחַטָּאת יַקְטִיר הַמִּזְבֵּחָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the fat of the sin offering he shall burn on the altar.

raw: וְהַמְשַׁלֵּחַ אֶת־הַשָּׂעִיר לַעֲזָאזֵל יְכַבֵּס בְּגָדָיו וְרָחַץ אֶת־בְּשָׂרוֹ בַּמָּיִם וְאַחֲרֵי־כֵן יָבוֹא אֶל־הַמַּחֲנֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he that letteth go the goat for Azazel shall wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in water, and afterward he shall come into the camp.

raw: וְאֵת פַּר הַחַטָּאת וְאֵת שְׂעִיר הַחַטָּאת אֲשֶׁר הוּבָא אֶת־דָּמָם לְכַפֵּר בַּקֹּדֶשׁ יוֹצִיא אֶל־מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה וְשָׂרְפוּ בָאֵשׁ אֶת־עֹרֹתָם וְאֶת־בְּשָׂרָם וְאֶת־פִּרְשָׁם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the bull of the sin offering, and the goat of the sin offering, whose blood was brought in to make atonement in the holy place, shall he carry forth outside the camp; and they shall burn in the fire their skins, and their flesh, and their dung.

raw: וְהַשֹּׂרֵף אֹתָם יְכַבֵּס בְּגָדָיו וְרָחַץ אֶת־בְּשָׂרוֹ בַּמָּיִם וְאַחֲרֵי־כֵן יָבוֹא אֶל־הַמַּחֲנֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he who burns them shall wash his clothes and bathe his body in water, and afterward he may come into the camp.

raw: וְהָיְתָה לָכֶם לְחֻקַּת עוֹלָם בַּחֹדֶשׁ הַשְּׁבִיעִי בֶּעָשׂוֹר לַחֹדֶשׁ תְּעַנּוּ אֶת־נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶם וְכָל־מְלָאכָה לֹא תַעֲשׂוּ הָאֶזְרָח וְהַגֵּר הַגָּר בְּתוֹכְכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And this shall be a statute lasting forever for you: In the seventh month, on the tenth of the month, you shall practice self-denial and do no work, neither the native nor the alien who resides among you.

raw: כִּי־בַיּוֹם הַזֶּה יְכַפֵּר עֲלֵיכֶם לְטַהֵר אֶתְכֶם מִכֹּל חַטֹּאתֵיכֶם לִפְנֵי יְהוָה תִּטְהָרוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For on this day atonement will be made for you, to cleanse you; from all your sins you will be cleansed before the Lord.

raw: שַׁבַּת שַׁבָּתוֹן הִיא לָכֶם וְעִנִּיתֶם אֶת־נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶם חֻקַּת עוֹלָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: It is a sabbath of solemn rest for you, and you shall afflict your souls; it is a statute forever.

raw: וְכִפֶּר הַכֹּהֵן אֲשֶׁר־יִמְשַׁח אֹתוֹ וַאֲשֶׁר יְמַלֵּא אֶת־יָדוֹ לְכַהֵן תַּחַת אָבִיו וְלָבַשׁ אֶת־בִּגְדֵי הַבָּד בִּגְדֵי הַקֹּדֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest, whom he shall anoint and whom he shall ordain to minister in his father's stead, shall make atonement, and shall put on the linen garments, the holy garments.

raw: וְכִפֶּר אֶת־מִקְדַּשׁ הַקֹּדֶשׁ וְאֶת־אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וְאֶת־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ יְכַפֵּר וְעַל הַכֹּהֲנִים וְעַל־כָּל־עַם הַקָּהָל יְכַפֵּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall make atonement for the most holy sanctuary, and for the tent of meeting, and for the altar he shall make atonement; and for the priests and for all the people of the assembly he shall make atonement.

raw: וְהָיְתָה־זֹּאת לָכֶם לְחֻקַּת עוֹלָם לְכַפֵּר עַל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל מִכָּל־חַטֹּאתָם אַחַת בַּשָּׁנָה וַיַּעַשׂ כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And this shall be a statute forever for you, to make atonement for the children of Israel for all their sins once a year. And he did as the Lord commanded Moses.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: דַּבֵּר אֶל־אַהֲרֹן וְאֶל־בָּנָיו וְאֶל כָּל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְאָמַרְתָּ אֲלֵיהֶם זֶה הַדָּבָר אֲשֶׁר־צִוָּה יְהוָה לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Speak to Aaron and to his sons and to all the children of Israel and say to them: This is the thing that the Lord has commanded, saying:

raw: אִישׁ אִישׁ מִבֵּית יִשְׂרָאֵל אֲשֶׁר יִשְׁחַט שׁוֹר אוֹ־כֶשֶׂב אוֹ־עֵז בַּמַּחֲנֶה אוֹ אֲשֶׁר יִשְׁחַט מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Any man from the house of Israel who slaughters an ox, or a sheep, or a goat in the camp, or who slaughters it outside the camp...

raw: וְאֶל־פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד לֹא הֱבִיאוֹ לְהַקְרִיב קָרְבָּן לַיהוָה לִפְנֵי מִשְׁכַּן יְהוָה דָּם יֵחָשֵׁב לָאִישׁ הַהוּא דָּם שָׁפָךְ וְנִכְרַת הָאִישׁ הַהוּא מִקֶּרֶב עַמּוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And to the entrance of the tent of meeting he did not bring it to offer an offering to the Lord before the tabernacle of the Lord, blood shall be reckoned to that man; he has shed blood, and that man shall be cut off from the midst of his people.

raw: לְמַעַן אֲשֶׁר יָבִיאוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶת־זִבְחֵיהֶם אֲשֶׁר הֵם זֹבְחִים עַל־פְּנֵי הַשָּׂדֶה וֶהֱבִיאֻם לַיהוָה אֶל־פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד אֶל־הַכֹּהֵן וְזָבְחוּ זִבְחֵי שְׁלָמִים לַיהוָה אוֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: In order that the children of Israel may bring their sacrifices, which they are sacrificing in the open field, and bring them to the LORD, to the entrance of the tent of meeting, to the priest, and sacrifice them as peace offerings to the LORD.
hebrew_roots: בנה (BNH) - to build (related to children as builders of the nation)
פנה (PNH) - face, presence, edge (used for 'open field')

raw: וְזָרַק הַכֹּהֵן אֶת־הַדָּם עַל־מִזְבַּח יְהוָה פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וְהִקְטִיר הַחֵלֶב לְרֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall sprinkle the blood on the altar of the Lord at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting, and he shall offer the fat as a pleasing aroma to the Lord.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר יִנְאַף אֶת־אֵשֶׁת אִישׁ אֲשֶׁר יִנְאַף אֶת־אֵשֶׁת רֵעֵהוּ מוֹת־יוּמַת הַנֹּאֵף וְהַנֹּאָפֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a man who commits adultery with the wife of another man, who commits adultery with the wife of his neighbor, the adulterer and the adulteress shall surely be put to death.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר יִשְׁכַּב אֶת־אֵשֶׁת אָבִיו עֶרְוַת אָבִיו גִּלָּה מוֹת־יוּמְתוּ שְׁנֵיהֶם דְּמֵיהֶם בָּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a man who lies with his father's wife has uncovered his father's nakedness; both of them shall surely be put to death; their blood is upon them.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר יִשְׁכַּב אֶת־כַּלָּתוֹ מוֹת יוּמְתוּ שְׁנֵיהֶם תֶּבֶל עָשׂוּ דְּמֵיהֶם בָּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a man who lies with his daughter-in-law, both of them shall surely be put to death; they have committed perversion, their blood is upon them.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר יִשְׁכַּב אֶת־זָכָר מִשְׁכְּבֵי אִשָּׁה תּוֹעֵבָה עָשׂוּ שְׁנֵיהֶם מוֹת יוּמָתוּ דְּמֵיהֶם בָּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a man who lies with a male as with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination; they shall surely be put to death; their blood is upon them.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר יִקַּח אֶת־אִשָּׁה וְאֶת־אִמָּהּ זִמָּה הִוא בָּאֵשׁ יִשְׂרְפוּ אֹתוֹ וְאֶתְהֶן וְלֹא־תִהְיֶה זִמָּה בְּתוֹכְכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a man who takes a woman and her mother, it is wickedness; they shall burn him and them with fire, so that there be no wickedness among you.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר יִתֵּן שְׁכָבְתּוֹ בִּבְהֵמָה מוֹת יוּמָת וְאֶת־הַבְּהֵמָה תַּהֲרֹגוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a man who gives his emission to an animal, he shall surely be put to death, and you shall kill the animal.

raw: וְאִשָּׁה אֲשֶׁר תִּקְרַב אֶל־כָּל־בְּהֵמָה לְרִבְעָה אֹתָהּ וְהָרַגְתָּ אֶת־הָאִשָּׁה וְאֶת־הַבְּהֵמָה מוֹת יוּמָתוּ דְּמֵיהֶם בָּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a woman who approaches any beast to lie with it, you shall kill the woman and the beast. They shall surely be put to death; their blood is upon them.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר־יִקַּח אֶת־אֲחֹתוֹ בַּת־אָבִיו אוֹ בַת־אִמּוֹ וְרָאָה אֶת־עֶרְוָתָהּ וְהִיא־תִרְאֶה אֶת־עֶרְוָתוֹ חֶסֶד הוּא וְנִכְרְתוּ לְעֵינֵי בְּנֵי עַמָּם עֶרְוַת אֲחֹתוֹ גִּלָּה עֲוֺנוֹ יִשָּׂא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if a man takes his sister, the daughter of his father or the daughter of his mother, and sees her nakedness, and she sees his nakedness, it is a disgrace, and they shall be cut off in the sight of the children of their people. He has uncovered his sister's nakedness; he shall bear his iniquity.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר־יִשְׁכַּב אֶת־אִשָּׁה דָּוָה וְגִלָּה אֶת־עֶרְוָתָהּ אֶת־מְקֹרָהּ הֶעֱרָה וְהִיא גִּלְּתָה אֶת־מְקוֹר דָּמֶיהָ וְנִכְרְתוּ שְׁנֵיהֶם מִקֶּרֶב עַמָּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if a man lies with a woman having her sickness, and uncovers her nakedness, he has exposed her source, and she has uncovered the source of her bleeding; both of them shall be cut off from among their people.

hebrew_roots.meaning: and they shall be cut off

raw: וְעֶרְוַת אֲחוֹת אִמְּךָ וַאֲחוֹת אָבִיךָ לֹא תְגַלֵּה כִּי אֶת־שְׁאֵרוֹ הֶעֱרָה עֲוֺנָם יִשָּׂאוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the nakedness of your mother's sister and your father's sister you shall not uncover; for he has exposed his own flesh; they shall bear their iniquity.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר יִשְׁכַּב אֶת־דֹּדָתוֹ עֶרְוַת דֹּדוֹ גִּלָּה חֶטְאָם יִשָּׂאוּ עֲרִירִים יָמֻתוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if a man lies with his father's sister, he has uncovered his father's nakedness; they shall bear their sin; they shall die childless.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר יִקַּח אֶת־אֵשֶׁת אָחִיו נִדָּה הִוא עֶרְוַת אָחִיו גִּלָּה עֲרִירִים יִהְיוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a man who takes his brother's wife, it is impurity; he has uncovered his brother's nakedness; they shall be childless.

raw: וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם אֶת־כָּל־חֻקֹּתַי וְאֶת־כָּל־מִשְׁפָּטַי וַעֲשִׂיתֶם אֹתָם וְלֹא־תָקִיא אֶתְכֶם הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר אֲנִי מֵבִיא אֶתְכֶם שָׁמָּה לָשֶׁבֶת בָּהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall keep all My statutes and all My ordinances, and perform them, lest the land to which I am bringing you to dwell vomit you out.

raw: וְלֹא תֵלְכוּ בְּחֻקֹּת הַגּוֹי אֲשֶׁר־אֲנִי מְשַׁלֵּחַ מִפְּנֵיכֶם כִּי אֶת־כָּל־אֵלֶּה עָשׂוּ וָאָקֻץ בָּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall not walk in the statutes of the nation that I am driving out before you, for they did all these things, and I loathed them.

hebrew_roots.meaning: a marker of the direct object

raw: וָאֹמַר לָכֶם אַתֶּם תִּירְשׁוּ אֶת־אַדְמָתָם וַאֲנִי אֶתְּנֶנָּה לָכֶם לָרֶשֶׁת אֹתָהּ אֶרֶץ זָבַת חָלָב וּדְבָשׁ אֲנִי יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵיכֶם אֲשֶׁר־הִבְדַּלְתִּי אֶתְכֶם מִן־הָעַמִּים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And I said to you, 'You shall inherit their land, and I will give it to you to possess, a land flowing with milk and honey. I am the Lord your God, who has separated you from the peoples.'

raw: וְהִבְדַּלְתֶּם בֵּין־הַבְּהֵמָה הַטְּהֹרָה לַטְּמֵאָה וּבֵין־הָעוֹף הַטָּמֵא לַטָּהֹר וְלֹא־תְשַׁקְּצוּ אֶת־נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶם בַּבְּהֵמָה וּבָעוֹף וּבְכֹל אֲשֶׁר תִּרְמֹשׂ הָאֲדָמָה אֲשֶׁר־הִבְדַּלְתִּי לָכֶם לְטַמֵּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And ye shall make a distinction between the clean beast and the unclean, and between the unclean fowl and the clean; and ye shall not make your souls abominable by beast, or by fowl, or by any manner of living thing that creepeth on the ground, which I have set apart for you to hold unclean.

raw: וִהְיִיתֶם לִי קְדֹשִׁים כִּי קָדוֹשׁ אֲנִי יְהוָה וָאַבְדִּל אֶתְכֶם מִן־הָעַמִּים לִהְיוֹת לִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall be holy to Me, for I, the LORD, am holy, and have separated you from the peoples, that you should be Mine.

raw: וְאִישׁ אוֹ־אִשָּׁה כִּי־יִהְיֶה בָהֶם אוֹב אוֹ יִדְּעֹנִי מוֹת יוּמָתוּ בָּאֶבֶן יִרְגְּמוּ אֹתָם דְּמֵיהֶם בָּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And any man or woman who is a medium or spiritist among them shall surely be put to death; they shall be stoned with stones, their blood shall be upon them.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה אֱמֹר אֶל־הַכֹּהֲנִים בְּנֵי אַהֲרֹן וְאָמַרְתָּ אֲלֵהֶם לְנֶפֶשׁ לֹא־יִטַּמָּא בְּעַמָּיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord said to Moses, speak to the priests, the sons of Aaron, and say to them: 'For a soul he shall not defile himself among his people,'

raw: כִּי אִם־לִשְׁאֵרוֹ הַקָּרֹב אֵלָיו לְאִמּוֹ וּלְאָבִיו וְלִבְנוֹ וּלְבִתּוֹ וּלְאָחִיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But only for his close relative, for his mother and for his father, and for his son and for his daughter, and for his brother.

raw: וְלַאֲחֹתוֹ הַבְּתוּלָה הַקְּרוֹבָה אֵלָיו אֲשֶׁר לֹא־הָיְתָה לְאִישׁ לָהּ יִטַּמָּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for his virgin sister, who is near to him, who has not been married to a man, for her he may defile himself.

raw: לֹא־יקרחה [יִקְרְחוּ] קָרְחָה בְּרֹאשָׁם וּפְאַת זְקָנָם לֹא יְגַלֵּחוּ וּבִבְשָׂרָם לֹא יִשְׂרְטוּ שָׂרָטֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: They shall not make bald spots on their heads, nor shave off the edges of their beards, nor make cuttings in their flesh.

raw: קְדֹשִׁים יִהְיוּ לֵאלֹהֵיהֶם וְלֹא יְחַלְּלוּ שֵׁם אֱלֹהֵיהֶם כִּי אֶת־אִשֵּׁי יְהוָה לֶחֶם אֱלֹהֵיהֶם הֵם מַקְרִיבִם וְהָיוּ קֹדֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: They shall be holy to their God and not profane the name of their God, for they offer the fire offerings of the Lord, the bread of their God; therefore they shall be holy.

raw: אִשָּׁה זֹנָה וַחֲלָלָה לֹא יִקָּחוּ וְאִשָּׁה גְּרוּשָׁה מֵאִישָׁהּ לֹא יִקָּחוּ כִּי־קָדֹשׁ הוּא לֵאלֹהָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall sanctify him, for he offers the bread of your God. He shall be holy to you, for I, the Lord, who sanctifies you, am holy.

raw: וּבַת אִישׁ כֹּהֵן כִּי תֵחֵל לִזְנוֹת אֶת־אָבִיהָ הִיא מְחַלֶּלֶת בָּאֵשׁ תִּשָּׂרֵף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the daughter of a priest, if she profanes herself by playing the harlot, she profanes her father; she shall be burned with fire.

raw: וְהַכֹּהֵן הַגָּדוֹל מֵאֶחָיו אֲ‍שֶׁר־יוּצַק עַל־רֹאשׁוֹ שֶׁמֶן הַמִּשְׁחָה וּמִלֵּא אֶת־יָדוֹ לִלְבֹּשׁ אֶת־הַבְּגָדִים אֶת־רֹאשׁוֹ לֹא יִפְרָע וּבְגָדָיו לֹא יִפְרֹם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the high priest from among his brothers, on whose head was poured the anointing oil and who is consecrated to wear the garments, shall not uncover his head nor tear his garments.

raw: וְעַל כָּל־נַפְשֹׁת מֵת לֹא יָבֹא לְאָבִיו וּלְאִמּוֹ לֹא יִטַּמָּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And over any dead person he shall not come; for his father or for his mother he shall not defile himself.

raw: וּמִן־הַמִּקְדָּשׁ לֹא יֵצֵא וְלֹא יְחַלֵּל אֵת מִקְדַּשׁ אֱלֹהָיו כִּי נֵזֶר שֶׁמֶן מִשְׁחַת אֱלֹהָיו עָלָיו אֲנִי יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And from the sanctuary he shall not go out, and he shall not profane the sanctuary of his God, for the crown of the anointing oil of his God is upon him; I am the LORD.

raw: וְהוּא אִשָּׁה בִבְתוּלֶיהָ יִקָּח׃

raw: אַלְמָנָה וּגְרוּשָׁה וַחֲלָלָה זֹנָה אֶת־אֵלֶּה לֹא יִקָּח כִּי אִם־בְּתוּלָה מֵעַמָּיו יִקַּח אִשָּׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: A widow, or a divorcee, or a profaned woman, or a prostitute, these he shall not take; but a virgin of his own people shall he take as a wife.

raw: וְלֹא־יְחַלֵּל זַרְעוֹ בְּעַמָּיו כִּי אֲנִי יְהוָה מְקַדְּשׁוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall not profane his offspring among his people, for I am the Lord who sanctifies him.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: דַּבֵּר אֶל־אַהֲרֹן לֵאמֹר אִישׁ מִזַּרְעֲךָ לְדֹרֹתָם אֲשֶׁר יִהְיֶה בוֹ מוּם לֹא יִקְרַב לְהַקְרִיב לֶחֶם אֱלֹהָיו׃

raw: כִּי כָל־אִישׁ אֲשֶׁר־בּוֹ מוּם לֹא יִקְרָב אִישׁ עִוֵּר אוֹ פִסֵּחַ אוֹ חָרֻם אוֹ שָׂרוּעַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For any man who has a defect shall not approach: a blind man, or a lame man, or one who has a slit nose, or any man with a limb too long,

raw: אוֹ אִישׁ אֲשֶׁר־יִהְיֶה בוֹ שֶׁבֶר רָגֶל אוֹ שֶׁבֶר יָד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: or a man who has a broken leg or a broken arm

raw: אוֹ־גִבֵּן אוֹ־דַק אוֹ תְּבַלֻּל בְּעֵינוֹ אוֹ גָרָב אוֹ יַלֶּפֶת אוֹ מְרוֹחַ אָשֶׁךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: or hunchbacked or thin or a growth in his eye or eczema or a skin disease or crushed testicles.

raw: כָּל־אִישׁ אֲשֶׁר־בּוֹ מוּם מִזֶּרַע אַהֲרֹן הַכֹּהֵן לֹא יִגַּשׁ לְהַקְרִיב אֶת־אִשֵּׁי יְהוָה מוּם בּוֹ אֵת לֶחֶם אֱלֹהָיו לֹא יִגַּשׁ לְהַקְרִיב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Any man of the offspring of Aaron the priest who has a defect shall not come near to offer the Lord’s fire offerings. Since he has a defect, he shall not come near to offer the bread of his God.

raw: לֶחֶם אֱלֹהָיו מִקָּדְשֵׁי הַקֳּדָשִׁים וּמִן־הַקֳּדָשִׁים יֹאכֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The bread of his God, from the most holy things and from the holy things he shall eat.

raw: וְלֶחֶם וְקָלִי וְכַרְמֶל לֹא תֹאכְלוּ עַד־עֶצֶם הַיּוֹם הַזֶּה עַד הֲבִיאֲכֶם אֶת־קָרְבַּן אֱלֹהֵיכֶם חֻקַּת עוֹלָם לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶם בְּכֹל מֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall offer with the bread seven lambs without blemish, year-old males, and one bull from the herd, and two rams. They shall be a burnt offering to the Lord, with their grain offering and their drink offerings, a food offering, a pleasing aroma to the Lord.

raw: וַעֲשִׂיתֶם שְׂעִיר־עִזִּים אֶחָד לְחַטָּאת וּשְׁנֵי כְבָשִׂים בְּנֵי שָׁנָה לְזֶבַח שְׁלָמִים׃

raw: וְהֵנִיף הַכֹּהֵן אֹתָם עַל לֶחֶם הַבִּכּוּרִים תְּנוּפָה לִפְנֵי יְהוָה עַל־שְׁנֵי כְּבָשִׂים קֹדֶשׁ יִהְיוּ לַיהוָה לַכֹּהֵן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall wave them with the bread of the firstfruits as a wave offering before the Lord, with the two lambs; they shall be holy to the Lord for the priest.

raw: וּקְרָאתֶם בְּעֶצֶם הַיּוֹם הַזֶּה מִקְרָא־קֹדֶשׁ יִהְיֶה לָכֶם כָּל־מְלֶאכֶת עֲבֹדָה לֹא תַעֲשׂוּ חֻקַּת עוֹלָם בְּכָל־מוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶם לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall proclaim on this very day that it shall be a holy convocation for you. You shall not do any ordinary work. It is a statute forever in all your dwelling places throughout your generations.

raw: וּבְקֻצְרְכֶם אֶת־קְצִיר אַרְצְכֶם לֹא־תְכַלֶּה פְּאַת שָׂדְךָ בְּקֻצְרֶךָ וְלֶקֶט קְצִירְךָ לֹא תְלַקֵּט לֶעָנִי וְלַגֵּר תַּעֲזֹב אֹתָם אֲנִי יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵיכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All manner of work you shall not do, and you shall present an offering by fire to the Lord.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: כִּי כָל־הַנֶּפֶשׁ אֲשֶׁר לֹא־תְעֻנֶּה בְּעֶצֶם הַיּוֹם הַזֶּה וְנִכְרְתָה מֵעַמֶּיהָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall take for yourselves on the first day the fruit of goodly trees, branches of palm trees, boughs of leafy trees, and willows of the brook; and you shall rejoice before the Lord your God seven days.

ai_data.translation_rugged: Upon the pure lampstand, he shall arrange the lamps before the Lord continually.

raw: וְלָקַחְתָּ סֹלֶת וְאָפִיתָ אֹתָהּ שְׁתֵּים עֶשְׂרֵה חַלּוֹת שְׁנֵי עֶשְׂרֹנִים יִהְיֶה הַחַלָּה הָאֶחָת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall take fine flour and bake it [into] twelve loaves; two tenths [of an ephah] shall be [in] each loaf.

raw: וְשַׂמְתָּ אוֹתָם שְׁתַּיִם מַעֲרָכוֹת שֵׁשׁ הַמַּעֲרָכֶת עַל הַשֻּׁלְחָן הַטָּהֹר לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall set them in two rows, six in a row, on the pure table before the LORD.

raw: וְנָתַתָּ עַל־הַמַּעֲרֶכֶת לְבֹנָה זַכָּה וְהָיְתָה לַלֶּחֶם לְאַזְכָּרָה אִשֶּׁה לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall put on the arrangement pure frankincense, that it may be for the bread as a memorial portion, an offering by fire to the Lord.

raw: בְּיוֹם הַשַּׁבָּת בְּיוֹם הַשַּׁבָּת יַעַרְכֶנּוּ לִפְנֵי יְהוָה תָּמִיד מֵאֵת בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל בְּרִית עוֹלָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: On the Sabbath day, on the Sabbath day, he shall arrange it before the Lord continually, from the children of Israel, as an everlasting covenant.

raw: וְהָיְתָה לְאַהֲרֹן וּלְבָנָיו וַאֲכָלֻהוּ בְּמָקוֹם קָדֹשׁ כִּי קֹדֶשׁ קָדָשִׁים הוּא לוֹ מֵאִשֵּׁי יְהוָה חָק־עוֹלָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it shall belong to Aaron and his sons, and they shall eat it in a holy place, for it is most holy to him from the offerings by fire to the Lord, a perpetual due.

raw: וַיֵּצֵא בֶּן־אִשָּׁה יִשְׂרְאֵלִית וְהוּא בֶּן־אִישׁ מִצְרִי בְּתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וַיִּנָּצוּ בַּמַּחֲנֶה בֶּן הַיִּשְׂרְאֵלִית וְאִישׁ הַיִּשְׂרְאֵלִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the son of an Israelite woman went out, whose father was an Egyptian, among the children of Israel; and this son of the Israelite woman and a man of Israel strove together in the camp.

raw: וַיִּקֹּב בֶּן־הָאִשָּׁה הַיִּשְׂרְאֵלִית אֶת־הַשֵּׁם וַיְקַלֵּל וַיָּבִיאוּ אֹתוֹ אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְשֵׁם אִמּוֹ שְׁלֹמִית בַּת־דִּבְרִי לְמַטֵּה־דָן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And blasphemed the son of the Israelite woman the Name, and cursed, and they brought him to Moses. And his mother's name was Shelomith, the daughter of Dibri, of the tribe of Dan.

raw: וַיַּנִּיחֻהוּ בַּמִּשְׁמָר לִפְרֹשׁ לָהֶם עַל־פִּי יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he put him in custody, to decide for them according to the word of the LORD.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: הוֹצֵא אֶת־הַמְקַלֵּל אֶל־מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה וְסָמְכוּ כָל־הַשֹּׁמְעִים אֶת־יְדֵיהֶם עַל־רֹאשׁוֹ וְרָגְמוּ אֹתוֹ כָּל־הָעֵדָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Bring the one who cursed outside the camp, and let all who heard him lay their hands on his head, and let all the congregation stone him.

raw: וְאֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל תְּדַבֵּר לֵאמֹר אִישׁ אִישׁ כִּי־יְקַלֵּל אֱלֹהָיו וְנָשָׂא חֶטְאוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And to the children of Israel you shall speak, saying, 'Anyone who curses his God shall bear his sin.'

raw: וְנֹקֵב שֵׁם־יְהוָה מוֹת יוּמָת רָגוֹם יִרְגְּמוּ־בוֹ כָּל־הָעֵדָה כַּגֵּר כָּאֶזְרָח בְּנָקְבוֹ־שֵׁם יוּמָת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he who blasphemes the name of the Lord shall surely be put to death. All the congregation shall stone him. The stranger as well as the native, when he blasphemes the name, shall be put to death.

raw: וְאִישׁ כִּי יַכֶּה כָּל־נֶפֶשׁ אָדָם מוֹת יוּמָת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a man, if he strikes any soul of man, he shall surely be put to death.

raw: וּמַכֵּה נֶפֶשׁ־בְּהֵמָה יְשַׁלְּמֶנָּה נֶפֶשׁ תַּחַת נָפֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And one who strikes the life of an animal shall compensate for it: a life in place of a life.

raw: וְאִישׁ כִּי־יִתֵּן מוּם בַּעֲמִיתוֹ כַּאֲשֶׁר עָשָׂה כֵּן יֵעָשֶׂה לּוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if a man causes a defect in his fellow, as he has done, so shall it be done to him.

raw: שֶׁבֶר תַּחַת שֶׁבֶר עַיִן תַּחַת עַיִן שֵׁן תַּחַת שֵׁן כַּאֲשֶׁר יִתֵּן מוּם בָּאָדָם כֵּן יִנָּתֶן בּוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Fracture for fracture, eye for eye, tooth for tooth; as he has caused a blemish in a man, so shall it be done to him.

raw: וּמַכֵּה בְהֵמָה יְשַׁלְּמֶנָּה וּמַכֵּה אָדָם יוּמָת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And whoever strikes an animal shall make restitution for it; and whoever strikes a man shall be put to death.

raw: מִשְׁפַּט אֶחָד יִהְיֶה לָכֶם כַּגֵּר כָּאֶזְרָח יִהְיֶה כִּי אֲנִי יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵיכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: One law shall there be to you, for the stranger as for the native; for I am the LORD your God.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר מֹשֶׁה אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וַיּוֹצִיאוּ אֶת־הַמְקַלֵּל אֶל־מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה וַיִּרְגְּמוּ אֹתוֹ אָבֶן וּבְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל עָשׂוּ כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses spoke to the children of Israel, and they brought the one who had cursed outside the camp, and they stoned him with stones. And the children of Israel did as the LORD commanded Moses.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה בְּהַר סִינַי לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses on Mount Sinai, saying:

raw: דַּבֵּר אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְאָמַרְתָּ אֲלֵהֶם כִּי תָבֹאוּ אֶל־הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר אֲנִי נֹתֵן לָכֶם וְשָׁבְתָה הָאָרֶץ שַׁבָּת לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Speak to the children of Israel, and say to them: When you come into the land that I am giving you, the land shall keep a Sabbath to the Lord.

raw: שֵׁשׁ שָׁנִים תִּזְרַע שָׂדֶךָ וְשֵׁשׁ שָׁנִים תִּזְמֹר כַּרְמֶךָ וְאָסַפְתָּ אֶת־תְּבוּאָתָהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Six years you shall sow your field, and six years you shall prune your vineyard and gather its produce.
hebrew_roots: זמר (z-m-r) - to prune, sing (contextually prune here)
ai_data.tone: Instructional, agricultural, legalistic (given its context in the Torah/Law)

raw: וּבַשָּׁנָה הַשְּׁבִיעִת שַׁבַּת שַׁבָּתוֹן יִהְיֶה לָאָרֶץ שַׁבָּת לַיהוָה שָׂדְךָ לֹא תִזְרָע וְכַרְמְךָ לֹא תִזְמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And in the seventh year, there shall be a sabbath of solemn rest for the land, a sabbath to the Lord; you shall not sow your field or prune your vineyard.
ai_data.tone: Religious, legalistic (in the sense of laying out laws and commands)

raw: אֵת סְפִיחַ קְצִירְךָ לֹא תִקְצוֹר וְאֶת־עִנְּבֵי נְזִירֶךָ לֹא תִבְצֹר שְׁנַת שַׁבָּתוֹן יִהְיֶה לָאָרֶץ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The aftergrowth of your harvest you shall not reap, and the grapes of your unpruned vine you shall not gather. It shall be a year of complete rest for the land.

raw: וְהָיְתָה שַׁבַּת הָאָרֶץ לָכֶם לְאָכְלָה לְךָ וּלְעַבְדְּךָ וְלַאֲמָתֶךָ וְלִשְׂכִירְךָ וּלְתוֹשָׁבְךָ הַגָּרִים עִמָּךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Sabbath of the land shall be food for you; for you, your male servant, your female servant, your hired worker, and the resident foreigner who lives with you.

raw: וְלִבְהֶמְתְּךָ וְלַחַיָּה אֲשֶׁר בְּאַרְצֶךָ תִּהְיֶה כָל־תְּבוּאָתָהּ לֶאֱכֹל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for your livestock and for the beast that is in your land, all its produce shall be for food.

raw: וְסָפַרְתָּ לְךָ שֶׁבַע שַׁבְּתֹת שָׁנִים שֶׁבַע שָׁנִים שֶׁבַע פְּעָמִים וְהָיוּ לְךָ יְמֵי שֶׁבַע שַׁבְּתֹת הַשָּׁנִים תֵּשַׁע וְאַרְבָּעִים שָׁנָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall count for yourself seven weeks of years, seven times seven years; and the time of the seven weeks of years shall be for you forty-nine years.

raw: וְהַעֲבַרְתָּ שׁוֹפַר תְּרוּעָה בַּחֹדֶשׁ הַשְּׁבִעִי בֶּעָשׂוֹר לַחֹדֶשׁ בְּיוֹם הַכִּפֻּרִים תַּעֲבִירוּ שׁוֹפָר בְּכָל־אַרְצְכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Then you shall sound the shofar loudly in the seventh month, on the tenth of the month; on the Day of Atonement you shall sound the shofar throughout all your land.

raw: וְקִדַּשְׁתֶּם אֵת שְׁנַת הַחֲמִשִּׁים שָׁנָה וּקְרָאתֶם דְּרוֹר בָּאָרֶץ לְכָל־יֹשְׁבֶיהָ יוֹבֵל הִוא תִּהְיֶה לָכֶם וְשַׁבְתֶּם אִישׁ אֶל־אֲחֻזָּתוֹ וְאִישׁ אֶל־מִשְׁפַּחְתּוֹ תָּשֻׁבוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall consecrate the fiftieth year, and proclaim liberty throughout the land to all its inhabitants. It shall be a jubilee for you, and each of you shall return to his possession, and each of you shall return to his family.

raw: יוֹבֵל הִוא שְׁנַת הַחֲמִשִּׁים שָׁנָה תִּהְיֶה לָכֶם לֹא תִזְרָעוּ וְלֹא תִקְצְרוּ אֶת־סְפִיחֶיהָ וְלֹא תִבְצְרוּ אֶת־נְזִרֶיהָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The jubilee, that fiftieth year shall be for you; you shall not sow, nor reap its aftergrowth, nor gather in from its unpruned vines.

raw: כִּי יוֹבֵל הִוא קֹדֶשׁ תִּהְיֶה לָכֶם מִן־הַשָּׂדֶה תֹּאכְלוּ אֶת־תְּבוּאָתָהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For it is a jubilee; it shall be holy to you. You shall eat from the field its produce.

raw: בִּשְׁנַת הַיּוֹבֵל הַזֹּאת תָּשֻׁבוּ אִישׁ אֶל־אֲחֻזָּתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: In this year of jubilee, you shall return, each one, to his possession.

raw: וְכִי־תִמְכְּרוּ מִמְכָּר לַעֲמִיתֶךָ אוֹ קָנֹה מִיַּד עֲמִיתֶךָ אַל־תּוֹנוּ אִישׁ אֶת־אָחִיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if you sell something to your neighbor or buy from your neighbor's hand, do not wrong one another.

raw: בְּמִסְפַּר שָׁנִים אַחַר הַיּוֹבֵל תִּקְנֶה מֵאֵת עֲמִיתֶךָ בְּמִסְפַּר שְׁנֵי־תְבוּאֹת יִמְכָּר־לָךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: According to the number of years after the jubilee you will buy from your fellow, according to the number of crop years he will sell to you.

raw: לְפִי רֹב הַשָּׁנִים תַּרְבֶּה מִקְנָתוֹ וּלְפִי מְעֹט הַשָּׁנִים תַּמְעִיט מִקְנָתוֹ כִּי מִסְפַּר תְּבוּאֹת הוּא מֹכֵר לָךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: According to the abundance of the years you shall increase its purchase price, and according to the fewness of the years you shall decrease its purchase price, for a number of harvests is he selling you.

raw: וְלֹא תוֹנוּ אִישׁ אֶת־עֲמִיתוֹ וְיָרֵאתָ מֵאֱלֹהֶיךָ כִּי אֲנִי יְהֹוָה אֱלֹהֵיכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall not wrong one another, but you shall fear your God; for I am the Lord your God.

hebrew_roots.gloss: a grammatical marker indicating the direct object

raw: וַעֲשִׂיתֶם אֶת־חֻקֹּתַי וְאֶת־מִשְׁפָּטַי תִּשְׁמְרוּ וַעֲשִׂיתֶם אֹתָם וִישַׁבְתֶּם עַל־הָאָרֶץ לָבֶטַח׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall do My statutes and keep My judgments and do them, that you may dwell in the land securely.

raw: וְנָתְנָה הָאָרֶץ פִּרְיָהּ וַאֲכַלְתֶּם לָשֹׂבַע וִישַׁבְתֶּם לָבֶטַח עָלֶיהָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the land will yield its fruit, and you will eat to satisfaction, and you will dwell in safety upon it.

raw: וְכִי תֹאמְרוּ מַה־נֹּאכַל בַּשָּׁנָה הַשְּׁבִיעִת הֵן לֹא נִזְרָע וְלֹא נֶאֱסֹף אֶת־תְּבוּאָתֵנוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if you say, 'What shall we eat in the seventh year, if we do not sow and do not gather our produce?'

raw: וְצִוִּיתִי אֶת־בִּרְכָתִי לָכֶם בַּשָּׁנָה הַשִּׁשִּׁית וְעָשָׂת אֶת־הַתְּבוּאָה לִשְׁלֹשׁ הַשָּׁנִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And I will command my blessing upon you in the sixth year, and it will bring forth produce enough for three years.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to do, to make, to produce

raw: וּזְרַעְתֶּם אֵת הַשָּׁנָה הַשְּׁמִינִת וַאֲכַלְתֶּם מִן־הַתְּבוּאָה יָשָׁן עַד הַשָּׁנָה הַתְּשִׁיעִת עַד־בּוֹא תְּבוּאָתָהּ תֹּאכְלוּ יָשָׁן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall sow the eighth year and eat from the produce, old grain, until the ninth year; until its produce comes in, you shall eat old grain.

raw: וְהָאָרֶץ לֹא תִמָּכֵר לִצְמִתֻת כִּי־לִי הָאָרֶץ כִּי־גֵרִים וְתוֹשָׁבִים אַתֶּם עִמָּדִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But the land shall not be sold in perpetuity, for the land is Mine; for you are strangers and sojourners with Me.

raw: וּבְכֹל אֶרֶץ אֲחֻזַּתְכֶם גְּאֻלָּה תִּתְּנוּ לָאָרֶץ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And in all the land of your possession, you shall grant a redemption for the land.

hebrew_roots.meaning: You shall give, you shall grant

raw: כִּי־יָמוּךְ אָחִיךָ וּמָכַר מֵאֲחֻזָּתוֹ וּבָא גֹאֲלוֹ הַקָּרֹב אֵלָיו וְגָאַל אֵת מִמְכַּר אָחִיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: When your brother becomes poor and sells some of his property, then his nearest redeemer shall come and redeem what his brother has sold.

raw: וְאִישׁ כִּי לֹא יִהְיֶה־לּוֹ גֹּאֵל וְהִשִּׂיגָה יָדוֹ וּמָצָא כְּדֵי גְאֻלָּתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if a man has no redeemer, and his hand attains and finds sufficient for his redemption...

raw: וְחִשַּׁב אֶת־שְׁנֵי מִמְכָּרוֹ וְהֵשִׁיב אֶת־הָעֹדֵף לָאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר מָכַר־לוֹ וְשָׁב לַאֲחֻזָּתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Then he shall reckon the years since he sold it and restore the overpayment to the man to whom he sold it, and he shall return to his possession.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to think, to calculate, to reckon

raw: וְאִם לֹא־מָצְאָה יָדוֹ דֵּי הָשִׁיב לוֹ וְהָיָה מִמְכָּרוֹ בְּיַד הַקֹּנֶה אֹתוֹ עַד שְׁנַת הַיּוֹבֵל וְיָצָא בַּיֹּבֵל וְשָׁב לַאֲחֻזָּתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if he cannot afford to redeem it himself, then what he sold shall remain in the hand of the purchaser until the year of jubilee; in the jubilee it shall be released, and he shall return to his possession.

raw: וְאִישׁ כִּי־יִמְכֹּר בֵּית־מוֹשַׁב עִיר חוֹמָה וְהָיְתָה גְּאֻלָּתוֹ עַד־תֹּם שְׁנַת מִמְכָּרוֹ יָמִים תִּהְיֶה גְאֻלָּתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if a man sells a dwelling house in a walled city, he may redeem it until a full year from its sale; he shall have a right of redemption.

raw: וְאִם לֹא־יִגָּאֵל עַד־מְלֹאת לוֹ שָׁנָה תְמִימָה וְקָם הַבַּיִת אֲשֶׁר־בָּעִיר אֲשֶׁר־לא [לוֹ] חֹמָה לַצְּמִיתֻת לַקֹּנֶה אֹתוֹ לְדֹרֹתָיו לֹא יֵצֵא בַּיֹּבֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if it is not redeemed within a full year, then the house in the unwalled city shall belong permanently to the buyer, throughout his generations; it shall not be released in the Jubilee.

raw: וּבָתֵּי הַחֲצֵרִים אֲשֶׁר אֵין־לָהֶם חֹמָה סָבִיב עַל־שְׂדֵה הָאָרֶץ יֵחָשֵׁב גְּאֻלָּה תִּהְיֶה־לּוֹ וּבַיֹּבֵל יֵצֵא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the houses of the villages which have no wall around them shall be counted as part of the open country; they may be redeemed, and they shall be released in the Jubilee.

raw: וְעָרֵי הַלְוִיִּם בָּתֵּי עָרֵי אֲחֻזָּתָם גְּאֻלַּת עוֹלָם תִּהְיֶה לַלְוִיִּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the cities of the Levites, the houses in the cities of their possession, shall have a perpetual redemption for the Levites.

raw: וַאֲשֶׁר יִגְאַל מִן־הַלְוִיִּם וְיָצָא מִמְכַּר־בַּיִת וְעִיר אֲחֻזָּתוֹ בַּיֹּבֵל כִּי בָתֵּי עָרֵי הַלְוִיִּם הִוא אֲחֻזָּתָם בְּתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if one of the Levites redeems, then the sale of a house and the city of his possession shall go out in the jubilee; for the houses of the cities of the Levites are their possession among the children of Israel.

raw: וּשְׂדֵה מִגְרַשׁ עָרֵיהֶם לֹא יִמָּכֵר כִּי־אֲחֻזַּת עוֹלָם הוּא לָהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the field, the pastureland of their cities, shall not be sold, for it is a perpetual possession for them.

raw: וְכִי־יָמוּךְ אָחִיךָ וּמָטָה יָדוֹ עִמָּךְ וְהֶחֱזַקְתָּ בּוֹ גֵּר וְתוֹשָׁב וָחַי עִמָּךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if your brother becomes poor, and his hand falters beside you, then you shall uphold him: as a stranger and a sojourner he shall live with you.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to be low, to be poor

raw: אַל־תִּקַּח מֵאִתּוֹ נֶשֶׁךְ וְתַרְבִּית וְיָרֵאתָ מֵאֱלֹהֶיךָ וְחֵי אָחִיךָ עִמָּךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Do not take from him interest or profit, but fear your God, so that your brother may live with you.

raw: אֶת־כַּסְפְּךָ לֹא־תִתֵּן לוֹ בְּנֶשֶׁךְ וּבְמַרְבִּית לֹא־תִתֵּן אָכְלֶךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Your money you shall not give him with interest, and for increase you shall not give your food.

raw: אֲנִי יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵיכֶם אֲשֶׁר־הוֹצֵאתִי אֶתְכֶם מֵאֶרֶץ מִצְרָיִם לָתֵת לָכֶם אֶת־אֶרֶץ כְּנַעַן לִהְיוֹת לָכֶם לֵאלֹהִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: I am the LORD your God, who brought you out of the land of Egypt to give you the land of Canaan, to be your God.
hebrew_roots: את (ʾēt): (Direct object marker, not a root)
הוֹצֵאתִי (hôṣēʾṯî): Brought out (from root יצא - Y-TZ-'A)
לָתֵת (lātēt): To give (from root נתן - N-T-N)
לִהְיוֹת (lih·yōṯ): To be (from root היה - H-Y-H)

raw: וְכִי־יָמוּךְ אָחִיךָ עִמָּךְ וְנִמְכַּר־לָךְ לֹא־תַעֲבֹד בּוֹ עֲבֹדַת עָבֶד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if your brother becomes poor beside you and sells himself to you, you shall not make him work as a slave.

raw: כְּשָׂכִיר כְּתוֹשָׁב יִהְיֶה עִמָּךְ עַד־שְׁנַת הַיֹּבֵל יַעֲבֹד עִמָּךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: He shall be with you as a hired worker, as a resident alien; he shall work with you until the year of Jubilee.

raw: וְיָצָא מֵעִמָּךְ הוּא וּבָנָיו עִמּוֹ וְשָׁב אֶל־מִשְׁפַּחְתּוֹ וְאֶל־אֲחֻזַּת אֲבֹתָיו יָשׁוּב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Then he shall go out from you, he and his sons with him, and shall return to his family and go back to the possession of his fathers.

raw: כִּי־עֲבָדַי הֵם אֲשֶׁר־הוֹצֵאתִי אֹתָם מֵאֶרֶץ מִצְרָיִם לֹא יִמָּכְרוּ מִמְכֶּרֶת עָבֶד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For they are My servants, whom I brought out of the land of Egypt; they shall not be sold as slaves are sold.

raw: לֹא־תִרְדֶּה בוֹ בְּפָרֶךְ וְיָרֵאתָ מֵאֱלֹהֶיךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: You shall not rule over him ruthlessly, and you shall fear your God.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to fear, to be in awe of

raw: וְעַבְדְּךָ וַאֲמָתְךָ אֲשֶׁר יִהְיוּ־לָךְ מֵאֵת הַגּוֹיִם אֲשֶׁר סְבִיבֹתֵיכֶם מֵהֶם תִּקְנוּ עֶבֶד וְאָמָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And your male and female slave whom you shall have, from the nations who are around you, from them you may acquire a male and female slave.

raw: וְגַם מִבְּנֵי הַתּוֹשָׁבִים הַגָּרִים עִמָּכֶם מֵהֶם תִּקְנוּ וּמִמִּשְׁפַּחְתָּם אֲשֶׁר עִמָּכֶם אֲשֶׁר הוֹלִידוּ בְּאַרְצְכֶם וְהָיוּ לָכֶם לַאֲחֻזָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And also of the children of the inhabitants that sojourn with you, of them shall ye buy, and of their families that are with you, which they begat in your land: and they shall be your possession.

raw: וְהִתְנַחֲלְתֶּם אֹתָם לִבְנֵיכֶם אַחֲרֵיכֶם לָרֶשֶׁת אֲחֻזָּה לְעֹלָם בָּהֶם תַּעֲבֹדוּ וּבְאַחֵיכֶם בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל אִישׁ בְּאָחִיו לֹא־תִרְדֶּה בוֹ בְּפָרֶךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall bequeath them to your children after you as a possession; you may hold them as property forever. You may treat them as slaves, but over your brothers, the Israelites, no one shall rule over his brother harshly.

raw: וְכִי תַשִּׂיג יַד גֵּר וְתוֹשָׁב עִמָּךְ וּמָךְ אָחִיךָ עִמּוֹ וְנִמְכַּר לְגֵר תּוֹשָׁב עִמָּךְ אוֹ לְעֵקֶר מִשְׁפַּחַת גֵּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if the hand of a stranger or sojourner with you prospers, and your brother with him becomes poor and sells himself to the stranger, sojourner with you, or to the descendant of a stranger's family...

raw: אַחֲרֵי נִמְכַּר גְּאֻלָּה תִּהְיֶה־לּוֹ אֶחָד מֵאֶחָיו יִגְאָלֶנּוּ׃

raw: אוֹ־דֹדוֹ אוֹ בֶן־דֹּדוֹ יִגְאָלֶנּוּ אוֹ־מִשְּׁאֵר בְּשָׂרוֹ מִמִּשְׁפַּחְתּוֹ יִגְאָלֶנּוּ אוֹ־הִשִּׂיגָה יָדוֹ וְנִגְאָל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Either his uncle, or his uncle's son, shall redeem him, or any who is near of kin of his family shall redeem him; or if he becomes rich, he shall redeem himself.

raw: וְחִשַּׁב עִם־קֹנֵהוּ מִשְּׁנַת הִמָּכְרוֹ לוֹ עַד שְׁנַת הַיֹּבֵל וְהָיָה כֶּסֶף מִמְכָּרוֹ בְּמִסְפַּר שָׁנִים כִּימֵי שָׂכִיר יִהְיֶה עִמּוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall reckon with the one who bought him from the year that he sold himself to him until the year of Jubilee, and the price of his sale shall be according to the number of years; as the days of a hired servant shall he be with him.

raw: אִם־עוֹד רַבּוֹת בַּשָּׁנִים לְפִיהֶן יָשִׁיב גְּאֻלָּתוֹ מִכֶּסֶף מִקְנָתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: If there are still many years left, according to them he shall redeem himself by paying back his redemption price from the money he obtained.

raw: וְאִם־מְעַט נִשְׁאַר בַּשָּׁנִים עַד־שְׁנַת הַיֹּבֵל וְחִשַּׁב־לוֹ כְּפִי שָׁנָיו יָשִׁיב אֶת־גְּאֻלָּתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if a little remains of the years until the year of Jubilee, then he shall reckon with him according to his years, and he shall repay his redemption.

raw: כִּשְׂכִיר שָׁנָה בְּשָׁנָה יִהְיֶה עִמּוֹ לֹא־יִרְדֶּנּוּ בְּפֶרֶךְ לְעֵינֶיךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: As a yearly hired worker shall he be with him; he shall not rule over him rigorously in your sight.

raw: וְאִם־לֹא יִגָּאֵל בְּאֵלֶּה וְיָצָא בִּשְׁנַת הַיֹּבֵל הוּא וּבָנָיו עִמּוֹ׃

raw: כִּי־לִי בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל עֲבָדִים עֲבָדַי הֵם אֲשֶׁר־הוֹצֵאתִי אוֹתָם מֵאֶרֶץ מִצְרָיִם אֲנִי יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵיכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For to Me [are] the children of Israel servants; My servants they are, whom I brought out of the land of Egypt. I [am] the Lord your God.

raw: לֹא־תַעֲשׂוּ לָכֶם אֱלִילִם וּפֶסֶל וּמַצֵּבָה לֹא־תָקִימוּ לָכֶם וְאֶבֶן מַשְׂכִּית לֹא תִתְּנוּ בְּאַרְצְכֶם לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֺת עָלֶיהָ כִּי אֲנִי יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵיכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: You shall not make idols for yourselves, or set up a carved image or a pillar, and you shall not place a figured stone in your land to bow down to it, for I am the Lord your God.

raw: אֶת־שַׁבְּתֹתַי תִּשְׁמֹרוּ וּמִקְדָּשִׁי תִּירָאוּ אֲנִי יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: You shall keep My Sabbaths and reverence My sanctuary; I am the Lord.

hebrew_roots.meaning: Sabbaths (plural, construct state, with 1st person singular pronominal suffix: 'My Sabbaths')
You shall keep/guard/observe (2nd person masculine plural)
My sanctuary (construct state with 1st person singular pronominal suffix)
You shall fear/revere (2nd person masculine plural)

raw: אִם־בְּחֻקֹּתַי תֵּלֵכוּ וְאֶת־מִצְוֺתַי תִּשְׁמְרוּ וַעֲשִׂיתֶם אֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: If you walk in my statutes and keep my commandments and do them,

raw: וְנָתַתִּי גִשְׁמֵיכֶם בְּעִתָּם וְנָתְנָה הָאָרֶץ יְבוּלָהּ וְעֵץ הַשָּׂדֶה יִתֵּן פִּרְיוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And I will give your rains in their season, and the land shall yield her increase, and the tree of the field shall give its fruit.

raw: וְהִשִּׂיג לָכֶם דַּיִשׁ אֶת־בָּצִיר וּבָצִיר יַשִּׂיג אֶת־זָרַע וַאֲכַלְתֶּם לַחְמְכֶם לָשֹׂבַע וִישַׁבְתֶּם לָבֶטַח בְּאַרְצְכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And your threshing shall reach unto the vintage, and the vintage shall reach unto the sowing time: and ye shall eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely.

raw: וְנָתַתִּי שָׁלוֹם בָּאָרֶץ וּשְׁכַבְתֶּם וְאֵין מַחֲרִיד וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי חַיָּה רָעָה מִן־הָאָרֶץ וְחֶרֶב לֹא־תַעֲבֹר בְּאַרְצְכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And I will grant peace in the land, and you shall lie down, and none shall make you afraid. And I will remove wild beasts from the land, and the sword shall not pass through your land.

raw: וּרְדַפְתֶּם אֶת־אֹיְבֵיכֶם וְנָפְלוּ לִפְנֵיכֶם לֶחָרֶב

raw: וְרָדְפוּ מִכֶּם חֲמִשָּׁה מֵאָה וּמֵאָה מִכֶּם רְבָבָה יִרְדֹּפוּ וְנָפְלוּ אֹיְבֵיכֶם לִפְנֵיכֶם לֶחָרֶב׃

raw: וּפָנִיתִי אֲלֵיכֶם וְהִפְרֵיתִי אֶתְכֶם וְהִרְבֵּיתִי אֶתְכֶם וַהֲקִימֹתִי אֶת־בְּרִיתִי אִתְּכֶם׃

raw: וַאֲכַלְתֶּם יָשָׁן נוֹשָׁן וְיָשָׁן מִפְּנֵי חָדָשׁ תּוֹצִיאוּ׃
