ai_data.translation_rugged: And if it is a female, then your assessment shall be thirty shekels.

raw: וְאִם מִבֶּן־חָמֵשׁ שָׁנִים וְעַד בֶּן־עֶשְׂרִים שָׁנָה וְהָיָה עֶרְכְּךָ הַזָּכָר עֶשְׂרִים שְׁקָלִים וְלַנְּקֵבָה עֲשֶׂרֶת שְׁקָלִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if (it be) from five years old even unto twenty years old, then thy estimation shall be of the male twenty shekels, and for the female ten shekels.

raw: וְאִם מִבֶּן־חֹדֶשׁ וְעַד בֶּן־חָמֵשׁ שָׁנִים וְהָיָה עֶרְכְּךָ הַזָּכָר חֲמִשָּׁה שְׁקָלִים כָּסֶף וְלַנְּקֵבָה עֶרְכְּךָ שְׁלֹשֶׁת שְׁקָלִים כָּסֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if [it be] from a month old even unto five years old, then thy estimation shall be of the male five shekels of silver, and for the female thy estimation shall be three shekels of silver.

raw: וְאִם מִבֶּן־שִׁשִּׁים שָׁנָה וָמַעְלָה אִם־זָכָר וְהָיָה עֶרְכְּךָ חֲמִשָּׁה עָשָׂר שָׁקֶל וְלַנְּקֵבָה עֲשָׂרָה שְׁקָלִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if from sixty years old and upward, if it is a male, then your valuation shall be fifteen shekels, and for a female, ten shekels.

raw: וְאִם־מָךְ הוּא מֵעֶרְכֶּךָ וְהֶעֱמִידוֹ לִפְנֵי הַכֹּהֵן וְהֶעֱרִיךְ אֹתוֹ הַכֹּהֵן עַל־פִּי אֲשֶׁר תַּשִּׂיג יַד הַנֹּדֵר יַעֲרִיכֶנּוּ הַכֹּהֵן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if he is poorer than your valuation, then he shall be placed before the priest, and the priest shall value him; according to what the vower can afford, the priest shall value him.

raw: וְאִם־בְּהֵמָה אֲשֶׁר יַקְרִיבוּ מִמֶּנָּה קָרְבָּן לַיהוָה כֹּל אֲשֶׁר יִתֵּן מִמֶּנּוּ לַיהוָה יִהְיֶה־קֹּדֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if it is an animal that they offer as a sacrifice to the Lord, whatever of it they give to the Lord shall be holy.

raw: לֹא יַחֲלִיפֶנּוּ וְלֹא־יָמִיר אֹתוֹ טוֹב בְּרָע אוֹ־רַע בְּטוֹב וְאִם־הָמֵר יָמִיר בְּהֵמָה בִּבְהֵמָה וְהָיָה־הוּא וּתְמוּרָתוֹ יִהְיֶה־קֹּדֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: He shall not substitute it, nor shall he exchange it, a good for a bad, or a bad for a good; and if he does exchange beast for beast, then both it and its substitute shall be holy.

raw: וְאִם כָּל־בְּהֵמָה טְמֵאָה אֲשֶׁר לֹא־יַקְרִיבוּ מִמֶּנָּה קָרְבָּן לַיהוָה וְהֶעֱמִיד אֶת־הַבְּהֵמָה לִפְנֵי הַכֹּהֵן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if any of the unclean animals that cannot be offered as a sacrifice to the Lord, he shall bring the animal before the priest.

raw: וְהֶעֱרִיךְ הַכֹּהֵן אֹתָהּ בֵּין טוֹב וּבֵין רָע כְּעֶרְכְּךָ הַכֹּהֵן כֵּן יִהְיֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall value it between good and bad; according to your valuation, O priest, so shall it be.

raw: וְאִם־גָּאֹל יִגְאָלֶנָּה וְיָסַף חֲמִישִׁתוֹ עַל־עֶרְכֶּךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if he surely redeems it, then he shall add a fifth to your valuation.

raw: וְאִישׁ כִּי־יַקְדִּשׁ אֶת־בֵּיתוֹ קֹדֶשׁ לַיהוָה וְהֶעֱרִיכוֹ הַכֹּהֵן בֵּין טוֹב וּבֵין רָע כַּאֲשֶׁר יַעֲרִיךְ אֹתוֹ הַכֹּהֵן כֵּן יָקוּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if a man consecrates his house as holy to the LORD, the priest shall value it, whether it is good or bad; as the priest values it, so it shall stand.

raw: וְאִם־הַמַּקְדִּישׁ יִגְאַל אֶת־בֵּיתוֹ וְיָסַף חֲמִישִׁית כֶּסֶף־עֶרְכְּךָ עָלָיו וְהָיָה לוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if the one who consecrated it redeems his house, then he shall add a fifth of its valuation money to it, and it shall be his.

raw: וְאִם מִשְּׂדֵה אֲחֻזָּתוֹ יַקְדִּישׁ אִישׁ לַיהוָה וְהָיָה עֶרְכְּךָ לְפִי זַרְעוֹ זֶרַע חֹמֶר שְׂעֹרִים בַּחֲמִשִּׁים שֶׁקֶל כָּסֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: If a man dedicates to the Lord part of the field he possesses, its assessment shall be in proportion to its seed: fifty shekels of silver to a homer of barley seed.

raw: אִם־מִשְּׁנַת הַיֹּבֵל יַקְדִּישׁ שָׂדֵהוּ כְּעֶרְכְּךָ יָקוּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: If he consecrates his field from the year of Jubilee, according to your valuation it shall stand.

hebrew_roots.meaning: jubilee (Strong's H3104 likely related to bringing/leading)

raw: וְאִם־אַחַר הַיֹּבֵל יַקְדִּישׁ שָׂדֵהוּ וְחִשַּׁב־לוֹ הַכֹּהֵן אֶת־הַכֶּסֶף עַל־פִּי הַשָּׁנִים הַנּוֹתָרֹת עַד שְׁנַת הַיֹּבֵל וְנִגְרַע מֵעֶרְכֶּךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if after the Jubilee he dedicates his field, then the priest shall reckon for him the money according to the years that remain until the year of the Jubilee, and it shall be deducted from your valuation.

raw: וְאִם־גָּאֹל יִגְאַל אֶת־הַשָּׂדֶה הַמַּקְדִּישׁ אֹתוֹ וְיָסַף חֲמִשִׁית כֶּסֶף־עֶרְכְּךָ עָלָיו וְקָם לוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if he indeed redeems the field that he dedicated, then he shall add a fifth of your valuation price to it, and it shall belong to him.

raw: וְאִם־לֹא יִגְאַל אֶת־הַשָּׂדֶה וְאִם־מָכַר אֶת־הַשָּׂדֶה לְאִישׁ אַחֵר לֹא יִגָּאֵל עוֹד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if he does not redeem the field, or if he has sold the field to another man, it may no longer be redeemed.

raw: וְהָיָה הַשָּׂדֶה בְּצֵאתוֹ בַיֹּבֵל קֹדֶשׁ לַיהוָה כִּשְׂדֵה הַחֵרֶם לַכֹּהֵן תִּהְיֶה אֲחֻזָּתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the field, when it goes out in the Jubilee, shall be holy to the LORD, as a field devoted; it shall be the priest's possession.

raw: וְאִם אֶת־שְׂדֵה מִקְנָתוֹ אֲשֶׁר לֹא מִשְּׂדֵה אֲחֻזָּתוֹ יַקְדִּישׁ לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if he consecrates to the Lord a field he purchased, which is not of the field of his possession,

raw: וְחִשַּׁב־לוֹ הַכֹּהֵן אֵת מִכְסַת הָעֶרְכְּךָ עַד שְׁנַת הַיֹּבֵל וְנָתַן אֶת־הָעֶרְכְּךָ בַּיּוֹם הַהוּא קֹדֶשׁ לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall reckon for him the amount of your valuation until the year of jubilee, and he shall give your valuation on that day as holy to the Lord.

raw: בִּשְׁנַת הַיּוֹבֵל יָשׁוּב הַשָּׂדֶה לַאֲשֶׁר קָנָהוּ מֵאִתּוֹ לַאֲשֶׁר־לוֹ אֲחֻזַּת הָאָרֶץ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: In the year of jubilee the field shall return to him from whom he bought it, to whom the possession of the land belongs.

raw: וְכָל־עֶרְכְּךָ יִהְיֶה בְּשֶׁקֶל הַקֹּדֶשׁ עֶשְׂרִים גֵּרָה יִהְיֶה הַשָּׁקֶל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all your valuation shall be according to the sanctuary shekel; twenty gerahs shall be the shekel.

raw: אַךְ־בְּכוֹר אֲשֶׁר־יְבֻכַּר לַיהוָה בִּבְהֵמָה לֹא־יַקְדִּישׁ אִישׁ אֹתוֹ אִם־שׁוֹר אִם־שֶׂה לַיהוָה הוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Only, a firstborn which is firstborn to the LORD among animals, no man shall consecrate it; whether ox or sheep, it is the LORD's.

raw: וְאִם בַּבְּהֵמָה הַטְּמֵאָה וּפָדָה בְעֶרְכֶּךָ וְיָסַף חֲמִשִׁתוֹ עָלָיו וְאִם־לֹא יִגָּאֵל וְנִמְכַּר בְּעֶרְכֶּךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if it concerns an unclean animal, then he shall redeem it at its valuation and add a fifth to it; if it is not redeemed, then it shall be sold at its valuation.

raw: אַךְ־כָּל־חֵרֶם אֲשֶׁר יַחֲרִם אִישׁ לַיהוָה מִכָּל־אֲשֶׁר־לוֹ מֵאָדָם וּבְהֵמָה וּמִשְּׂדֵה אֲחֻזָּתוֹ לֹא יִמָּכֵר וְלֹא יִגָּאֵל כָּל־חֵרֶם קֹדֶשׁ־קָדָשִׁים הוּא לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Nevertheless, anything that a man devotes to the LORD from all that he has, whether man or beast or field of his possession, shall not be sold or redeemed; every devoted thing is most holy to the LORD.

raw: כָּל־חֵרֶם אֲשֶׁר יָחֳרַם מִן־הָאָדָם לֹא יִפָּדֶה מוֹת יוּמָת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Every devoted thing, that a man shall devote to the LORD, shall not be sold or redeemed; every devoted thing is most holy to the LORD.

raw: וְכָל־מַעְשַׂר הָאָרֶץ מִזֶּרַע הָאָרֶץ מִפְּרִי הָעֵץ לַיהוָה הוּא קֹדֶשׁ לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all the tithe of the land, whether of the seed of the land or of the fruit of the tree, is the Lord's; it is holy to the Lord.

raw: וְאִם־גָּאֹל יִגְאַל אִישׁ מִמַּעַשְׂרוֹ חֲמִשִׁיתוֹ יֹסֵף עָלָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if a man at all redeems any of his tithe, he shall add a fifth to it.

raw: וְכָל־מַעְשַׂר בָּקָר וָצֹאן כֹּל אֲשֶׁר־יַעֲבֹר תַּחַת הַשָּׁבֶט הָעֲשִׂירִי יִהְיֶה־קֹּדֶשׁ לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And every tithe of cattle and sheep, everything that passes under the rod, the tenth one shall be holy to the Lord.

raw: לֹא יְבַקֵּר בֵּין־טוֹב לָרַע וְלֹא יְמִירֶנּוּ וְאִם־הָמֵר יְמִירֶנּוּ וְהָיָה־הוּא וּתְמוּרָתוֹ יִהְיֶה־קֹדֶשׁ לֹא יִגָּאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: He shall not distinguish between good and bad, neither shall he exchange it; and if he at all exchange it, then both it and that for which it is exchanged shall be holy; it shall not be redeemed.

raw: אֵלֶּה הַמִּצְוֺת אֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל בְּהַר סִינָי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: These are the commandments which the Lord commanded Moses to the children of Israel on Mount Sinai.
